Welatfareg Yesus o ino embeselug ik Galilea yenggelehon ayegma libareg punumu lahibareg heriyeg latfag.

Heriyegman ap anggolo arimano mondeg angge Yesus ambeg waharuk lit ap unuyug siyahon men enembol simbuk tohon men inil hupnihon men enele larehon men ouk eke hag eke hag warukon men hondog eneplug Yesus alukema imbisik waharukmu obog toho Aren hihir eneptuk latfag.

Hihir eneptuk latfagma ap anggolo arimanowen yet harukmen enele larehon enele urukmu enembol simbuk tohon pikir atukmu unuyug siyahon fano atug larukmu inil hupnihon fano atug yet harukmu ap welatfahon arimanowen yihi uruk lit enekol hibareg Allah Israel inap Inikni wel turuk latfag.

Welatfareg Yesusen otsi Niraham tiya maniyek ulug wol enepfareg, "Ap anggolo aruma hup hinahanam suburu na fug anggeyen An men ambiyeg wahereg weregma Nindi isaruk lahi. Suburu hinik larukmen keman unuyug wiyig am nowen aliyek imin fug," ibag.
Ari ibagma Otsiyen te, "Ap eleg ambeg tuma welahereg ap teng-teng angge aruma nangginoho suburu og usulon fahet uruk lahen," ibag.
Ari ibagma Yesusen, "Suburu nombaren foroho lahep?" ulug kapal isibagma, "Suburu sabiren men ikan toron tot foroho lahe," ibag.
Ari ibagma Yesusen, "Ap aruma kinangma tuma hur amusa," ibareg
suburu sabiren men ikan men wibareg seneg lit sembahyang ibareg kut-kut Otsi og isibagma Otsiyen te ap anggolo arimano fibir eneptuk latfag.
Fibir eneptuk latfagma it obog toho nibareg enehum ouk atfagma minggir atfahon arimano sum sabiren yuharoho imbibag.
Ap suburu nibahon arimano hiyap men malik men winahuk fug angge ap suwon eneg teng-teng angge (empat ribu) arimano nibag.
Nibagma Yesusen hinibam aliyek ulug hiyag isibareg At kou fam kibareg o Magadan fil laruk latfag.
Welatfagma Farisi inap men Saduki inap men Yesus wal hul ulug watfareg, "Poholmonen turuk ane misig niren yet hulen timihin," ulug heng tibag.
Ari ulug heng tibagma Yesusen, "O hupmu hil yinggiruk halug hup hibi nohik ohoreg uruk lahep.
Hubet sakan tirikim hina het teg halug o muru rik ohoreg uruk lahep. Poholen turuk ane honoluk teg lahep angge famen enehangge fobik tuhuwon fahet henepeleg toho welahep.

Hit siyag ane turuk hinap tiya welahebonen poholmonen turuk ane yet hul ulug heng Naptuk lahep angge famen we wirimangge Yunus fam tibahon eneg fobik yet hahup," ulug hiyag isibareg Yesus it embeselug libag.
Yesus otsi men ik ahum ke nindig atuk lit Otsiyen suburu enepeleg atfag.
Suburu enepeleg atfagma larukmen Yesusen, "Farisi inap men Saduki inap menen sig angge suburu roti wirabuk oho lit kilaptuk angge yet teg lit hinindimu honoluk toho welamok," ibag.
Ari ibagma Yesus otsiyen, "Suburu nenepeleg aha ane fahet hiyag nisaruk ano," ulug enele enemu sahaltuk latfag.
Enemu sahaltuk latfag ane Yesus oluk atfareg, "Nori, An nubam hinindi wenggel ha fug angge nungge fahet suburu eleg ulug hinindi anggin toho wereg lit uruk lahep?
Hinindi anggar atuk eleg? Suburu fuwaben famen ap teng-teng angge (lima ribu) arimanowen narusama sum nombaren yunggaroho emberikip ane ino henepeleg atisi ano?
Suburu sabiren famen ap teng-teng angge (empat ribu) arimanowen narusama sum nombaren yunggaroho emberikip?

Anden ihi ane ari suburu fahet ihi fug angge famen nungge fahet suburu fahet ehek peruk lahep? Farisi inap men Saduki inap men sig angge roti wirabuk oho lit kilaptuk angge yet teg lit honoluk toho welamok ulug Anden hiyag hisaruk lahi," ulug Yesusen otsi hiyag isibag.
Fobik ibag ane ino famen suburu roti fahet ehek fug, Farisi inap men Saduki inap menen hiyag isaruk ane yet teg lamok ulug komo nenebehek ulug inindi anggar atfag.
Welatfareg Yesus o Kaisarea Filipusen witfag ibam libareg Otsi kapal isaruk lit, "At ap kinangmon atfahon fahet ap aruman sa peruk?" ibag.

Ari ibagma Otsiyen te, "It winonen Yohanes ap ikma pilap eneptuk latisi ahun ino urukmu it winonen Elia ino uruk, it winonen Yeremia ano, atam Allah wene hiyag isaruk latfahon misig waharisi ano uruk," ibag.
Ari ibagma Yesusen te, "Hiren te An fahet sa peruk lahep?" ulug kapal isibagma
Simon Petrus inowen, "Hat Mesias Allah oluk werehon Amloho ino Hat welahen," ibag.
Ari ibagma Yesusen, "Yunus amloho Simon hat hahiyeg toho welamin. Haren ehenon aru aben hiyag herehesama ehen fug, Nikni poholmonen hiyag herehekma ehen.

Anden hat hubam tot imin: Hat te Petrus helep ineyon hag toho welahen. Anden numalikisi mumal enebuhukon helep ineyon aru fam in enebuhukmu ap war atukon wereg ambehen siyagman sen enesug lamuhup fug.
Allah wereg ambeg kurukon sok husuruk angge hinggikmu umbuhuk. Kinangman pug tebuhunon poholman oho pug teg welaruhu. Kinangman lole fuhunon poholman oho loleg angge welaruhu," ibag.
Ari ibareg Yesusen otsi fam, "An fahet Mesias tu wereg uk fug," ulug Otsi komo enepfag.

O ino sambil ak tibareg Yesusen otsi hiyag isaruk lit, "An Yerusalem lahukmu it Yahudi inap onowesi men imam usane onoluk inap onowesi men Musa wene onoluk inap menen An nubam angginon umbuhupteg Nele ying Naptuk lit pinggi Nuwabuhupmu ninggik pirenam welaruhukteg hinahaneg angge Noluk aruhuk," ibag.
Ari ibagma Petrus inowen At inggik lisoho wibareg komo ruruk lit, "Nowe, ehen ane aru teko lahu fug, hele si ehen," ibagma

Yesusen Petrus hebeloho kim haruk lit, "Hat Iblis hebe, haren Nindi angginap Naptuk lit Allah poholmonen peruk ane wenggel ha fug angge ap kinangmonen peruk ane eneg wenggel haruk lahen," ulug Petrus pet tibag.
Pet tibareg Yesusen otsi hiyag isaruk lit, "Ap san An nombolim lamin perukon inowen inggareg apmayap taruk lit teltuk ahen ha rulug An nombolim laruk laruhu.
An noluk welaruhuk peruk ahun ino oluk welaruhu fug. Nowe unuk fahet war atnin peruk ahun ino Allah olohotma mondabi tem toho oluk welaruhu.

Ap misig mun angge man angge kinangma ngi aruhu angge famen indi wenggel ha fug angge Allah olohotman longgo uruk halug nungge fahet ngi aruhu? Mondabi fano welaruhu ane fahet nungge ayeg waroho og um teg?

At ap kinangmon atfahon Ikniyen Ineyap turukmu Otsi malaikat walinggoho wereg lit umbagpag toho wamuhup. At waruhu sambil ino ap obog toho arimanowen siyag ane fano ane turuk latuson arimano hikit toho ayeg waruhu.
Hit aruma welahebon sehelimu werehon winonen te At ap atik ibahon ino ap obog toho onowe reg lit wambik waharukmu war am fug angge honoluk wereg lit yet hahup," ulug hiyag isibag.
Wene ari hiyag isibagma hup falfalikenam atfagma Yesus otsi Petrus men Yakobus men Yohanes men hondog eneplug it ambiyeg punu yaron fam lahibareg it enemu wereg latfag.
Enemu wereg latfagma it hinahan itano inilmu Yesus ebe nin atfagma Orohole mo asinandi hag toho umbagpag turuk lit Asum umbagpag turuk lit o sakan tegma hag toho teg latfag.
Ari reg latfagma Musa men Elia men At men enele urukmu iren kilap enesug latfag.
Kilap enesug latfagma Petrusen Yesus fam te, "Nowe, nit tuma welahe ambeg fanoma welahereg Haren o sabo hinahan witihip imihinmu Hat fahet eke, Musa fahet eke, Elia fahet eke wibul," ibag.

At ele urukmu itano hina selehon ino watfareg it hililip enepfagma hina apmane Ap ele eke uruk lit, "An namloho fahet Anden fano peruk lit Nindi reg lahiyon tu, At ele holtuk lamuhup," urukmu hol hibag.
Ari urukmu hol hibareg Otsi enekol anggolo hibareg kinangma ying atfag.
Ying atfagma Yesus it enembeg watfareg sen isaruk lit, "Hit henekol fug, in amek," ibag.
Ari ibagma it onorohole leko yet harukmu ap winon elegma we Yesus amu eneg welatfag.
Punu ino famen wambik waharuk lit, "At ap kinangmon atfahon ino war aruhureg Oluk am fugmu hiren turukmu yet hehep ane ari ap misig oho hiyag isa fug," ibag.
Ari ibagma Otsiyen kapal haruk lit, "Ari reg angge famen Musa wene onoluk inaben Elia tam waruhu uruk ane ari nungge fahet uruk?" ibagma
Yesusen te, "Elia tam waruhureg obog toho arimano pikirap tuhu angge famen

Elia tam waharisi, ari tem toho hiyag hisaruk lahi. At waharisi angge famen ap enepeleg toho wereg lit we it ininggarehen peruk ane ubam eneg turuk latusa. Ari hag toho At ap kinangmon atfahon ino oho it arimanowen alem angginon ubam umbuhup," ulug Yesusen hiyag isibag.
Ari ulug hiyag isarukmu Yohanes ap ikma pilap eneptuk latfag ahun ino fahet hiyag nisaruk ulug inindi anggar atfag.
Tom famen Yesus otsi men ap anggolo wereg ambeg wambibareg weregman ap misig Yesus alukema hur atfareg
ele uruk lit, "Nowe, an numalik fahet Hindi himin. At il fulug turuk lit indokma keheg ikma wambeheg turuk lit ouk anggolo waruk.
Ari turuk lit werehen Hat hotsi enembeg walug waharikik angge famen iren fanowap tuk fug teg latusa," ibag.

Ari ibagma Yesusen, "Hit An nubam hinindi wenggel ha fug anggeyen henepeleg toho welahepma An hit men mondabi amusun toho welaruhuk ano? Nombarenam welaruhukteg hit sehelimuwen Nindi imbik wamburuk laruhuk? Malik ari ulug maniyek," ibag.
Malik ino ulug watfagma siyag angge undama werehon ino fam Yesusen ele ine roho pet tibagma siyag angge ino wilip atfagma malik ino fano atfag.
Fano atfagma Yesus otsi enemu wereg lit Onowe ubam, "Nungge fahet setan ino nit nenemuwen yanggaloho wilibuk fug teg lahe?" ulug Onowe kapal hibag.

Kapal hibagma Aren te, "Hit An nubam wenggel haruk lahep fuhon ariyen setan ino wilibuk fug teg lahep. Hinindimu Allah fam tem peruk lit soluk anggen hahon hunubam welalepma punu aru fam, 'Heneko ahamu yag arik lag!' elepma yag arik lelep. Mun angge man angge hiren tuk fug tohon wereg lalep fug.
Setan aru hahon wereg halug we hiyang wereg lit sembahyang urukmu eneg yanggaloho wilibuk teg," ulug Otsi hiyag isibag.
Yesus otsi men o Galilea welatfareg Yesusen it hiyag isaruk lit, "At ap kinangmon atfahon ino fobik ap ininggikmu aruhumu
iren At ino ware fesuhupmu inggik hinahaneg angge Oluk aruhu," ulug hiyag isibagma Otsi inindi anggin anggolo atfag.

Yesus otsi men o Kapernaum weregma Allah ibam fahet uang emberukon heng eneptuk inap Petrus ambeg watfareg, "Hit Honowe aruwen uang anggen piren itano Allah ibam fahet emberuk ano eleg ano," ulug kapal hibag.

Ari ulug kapal hibagma Petrusen te emberuk ibag. Ari ibareg olma Yesus wereg ambeg kibareg Yesus hiyag itmin ulug turukmen Yesusen tam at ubam ele uruk lit, "Simon, anden iminon tu fahet nungge pemihin. Ap suwon kinangma werehon arimanowen uang imbiyek ulug heng eneptuk ane ari ininggareg onotsi fam ano ap pohon unubam ano heng eneptukon ari fahet haren nungge pemihin?" ulug kapal hibag.
Ari ulug kapal hibagma Petrusen te, "Ap pohon unubam heng eneptuk," ibagma Yesusen, "Ari ehenma ininggareg onotsi arimano umbuhuk fug ulug inindi se roho welamag," ibag.

"Nit nunubam alem umbuhup tohon it inindi fano amag ulug haren ikan yami rik lamihin," ibag. "Ikan tam watnihinon ino wamihinteg ambilik kiyog hamihinmu ambilikmu uang anggen uhan weregma hamihin. Hamihinteg walug watnihinteg An faheret hat faheret it ininggikmu embemihin," ibag.
Misihim Yesus otsi Onowe ambeg libareg, "Allah wereg ambehen ap sa suwon welaruhu?" ulug kapal hibag.
Kapal hibagma Yesusen malik toron misig wol tibareg it walinggoho weregma it sehelimuwen unduhuk fibag.
Unduhuk fibareg, "Hit hinindimu siyag angge werehon umbusuk fug angge malik toron indi hag toho amuhup fug halug Allah ambeg kuhup fug," ibag.
"Inggarehen apmayap tarukon malik toron hag aruhuwon ino Allah ambeg kuhureg su aruhu," ibag.
"An nubam indi wenggel haruk lit malik toron tu hahon hondog talug foroho ahun inowen An fet nasug lit wereg," ibag.
"Malik toron aruma An nubam wenggel haruk angge famen inindi nina feseruk ahun ino anggolopma helep humon ililoho ik ahummu pila feselepma fano," ibag.
"Ap o kema-kema werehonen ap eke inindi angginap feseruk inap siyag amag. Ap inindi angginon kema-kema wereg angge famen we inindi anggina feserukon arimano siyag amag."

"Hinggik men huyug menen hindi nina feseruk halug kong toho hik esemok. Hinggik huyug kong tebeselug Allah weregma kuhunmu fano. Hinggik huyug abir angge weregma indok suwon fam hik hiyahupmu ari siyag.

Hilanggen fam yet halug hindi ninap haptuk halug hil misig hililoho hik isahunmu fano. Hil misig eneg weregma Allah wereg ambeg kuhunmu fano. Hil pirener angge weregma indok suwon fam hik hiyahupmu ari siyag.
Malik toron aruma apma wereg ulug wenggel hahup tohon honoluk toho welamok. It toron aruma fer enesuhon Allah otsi malaikat likiya hupmu Allah alukema werehen Anden hiyag hisaruk lahi.
At ap atik ibahon ino it longgo urukon arimano hiyag enebuhuk ulug waharisi."

"Hiren nangginoho peruk lahep? Ap ekeyen wam domba teng hinahan (seratus) foroho lit weregma sehelimuwon misig longgo elepma it werehon (sembilan puluh sembilan) itano anggenma tom alem ke embeselug longgo elebon ino yami relep fug ano?
Longgo elebon ino hiyag alep halug it winon arimano wereg angge famen misig longgo elebon ino fahet ahiyeg anggolo helep ulug ari we tem toho hiyag hisaruk lahi.
Hinikni poholmon inowen oho malik toron misig aruma longgo uhubon ari siyag peruk lit wereg."
"Hare eke siyag ane turuk halug ambeg lahunteg hare amu eneg weregma komo ruhun. Haren uhun ane hele holtuk halug nare indi fano aha puhun.

Hare amu eneg weregma uhun ane holtuk eleg halug ap misig piren hondog enebuhun. Hondog enebuhunmu iren oho hare komo ruhup. Atam haharoho imbibahon te, 'Alem weregma ap piren hinahan alem ino onolukonen enele uruk lit alem haloho umbuhup,' ulug haharoho imbibahon hikit toho iren oho hare komo ruhup.

Iren komo rurukmu holtuk eleg halug wene onoluk inap obog toho palu roho weregma holukag ulug hiyag isahun. Iren komo ruhup ane holtuk eleg halug ap tu Allah wene apeleg ahun siyag ane eneg turuk ahun hag toho wereg puhup.
Hiren kinangma tuman pug tebuhup halug poholman oho pug toho welaruhu. Hiren kinangma tuman lole fesuhup halug poholman oho loloho welaruhu. Ari we tem toho hiyag hisaruk lahi.
Nin eke misig hiyag hisamin: Ap piren kinangma werehon Allah fam tu heng tul ulug inindi misig atuk halug ari Nikni poholmonen og hisahu.
Ap piren hinahan An nunuk fam palu roho welamuhup halug An pulmu unduhuk laruhuk," ulug Yesusen hiyag isibag.

Yesusen ari ulug hiyag isibagma Petrus inowen Yesus fam te, "Nowe, nareyen nubam siyag ane turukmu ninggik winag harukmen nombarenam atuk halug nambolmayap turuk laruhuk? Siyag ane nubam turukmu ninggik sabirenam atuk halug hebeloho waruhuk ano?" ulug Petrusen Yesus kapal hibag.
Kapal hibagma Yesusen te, "Sabirenam atuk halug hebeloho wabuk fug. Teng sabirenam atukmu oho hebeloho wabuk fug angge hondo rebeseruk laruhun.
Allah ap obog toho Inikni aruhuwon ino ap suwon misig hag toho wereg. Ap suwon inowen otsi fam, 'Anden angge paleg lahebon winag hulen maniyek,' ulug wol eneptisi.
Wol eneptisimu otsi arimano waharusama paleg angge winag harukmu ap misig fam uang inggila teng-teng angge numen (berjuta-juta) og itfahon palehon welatisi.
Paleg angge fahet og um fug teg latisimu ap suwon inowen uhe men umalikisi men aren angge obog toho hilaminon aru famen anden angge obog toho ayeg war amag perisi.
Ari perisimu ap suwon ino alukema hur atisireg, 'Nikni, nilmu wereg atuk halug hanggengge fahet fobik og huruhuken hindi yuwag toho welamin,' irisi.
Ari irisiyon fahet ap suwon inowen indi harisireg inggik lole ferisireg, 'Paleg angge fahet fobik og nuruhun fug, lamihin,' irisi.

Lamihin irisimu ap ino wilip atisireg larukmen are eke uang inggila misig paleg latisiyon ino men kema salkal urusa. Salkal urusareg are ino sen harisireg anggolop pete haruk lit, 'Nanggengge paleg lahenon ari og nimin,' irisi.
Og nimin irisimu are ino alukema hur atuk lit, 'Nare, nilmu wereg atuk halug hanggengge fahet fobik og huruhuken hindi yuwag toho welamin,' irisi.
Ari irisimu are ino ele holuk fug anggeyen hele waroho penjara fam kila feserisireg, 'Palehon fahet og nuruhun halug eneg wilip aruhun,' irisi.
Ari turukmu ori winonen yet harusareg enere fahet inindi siyag atusama inikni ap suwon ino ambeg huruwe larusa.

Huruwe larusama ap suwon inowen, 'Ap ari nambeg watnisiyen hondohik lalihip,' ulug otsi mon eneptisi. Ap ino hondoholug waharusama ap suwon inowen, 'Nare, hat siyag hahun, haren an nubam hele ilaheg toho ehenma haren paleg lahenon fahet anden apmayap tihi.
Anden hat nindi hiyihi hag toho haren oho hare fahet hindi reg lalen,' irisi.
Ari irisireg olok harisireg inggik hele waroho unggum kong turuk inap wereg ambeg wabusa ulug og isarisireg, 'Nanggengge palehon fahet obog toho og nuruhumu eneg wilip fesuhup,' irisi.
Honoriyen hunubam siyag ane turukon fahet hinindi hondo rebeselug ambolmayap tuhup fugmu ap suwon inowen tirisiyon hag toho Nikni poholmonen oho hit hunubam tuhu," ulug Yesusen hiyag isibag.
Yesusen wene ari obog toho hiyag isibareg Galilean wilip atug o Yudea Yordan fumag fil werehon libag.
Ap anggolo luhaloho Ombolim laruk latfagma ouk warukon arimano Aren hihir eneptuk latfag.
Hihir eneptuk latfagma Farisi inaben At wal hul ulug watfareg kapal haruk lit, "Aben hiyap og talug anggeyen alem winon-winon ubam embelug hiyap ino umbusuk hag teg ano?" ulug umung hibag.
Umung hibagma Yesusen te, "Atam wal tibag Ahun inowen ap men hiyap men wal enepfag ane suwesingga fam haharehon harikip fug?
Wal enepfareg hiyag isaruk lit, 'Aben ikni men isinga men embeselug uhe men mangno roho wereg lit enebe misig welamuhup,' ibag.
Wal enepfag ahun inowen ari ibagma it itano enebe piren fug, enebe misig wereg. Allahn misihap tibahon ari aben pirenap tuk fug teg," ibag.

Yesusen ari ibagma iren te, "Aben nuhe embesemin peruk halug suwesingga fam, 'Hiyap tu imbisihi,' ulug haharoho hiyap ino inggikmu og uruhu ulug Musan ibag ane ari nungge fahet ibag," ulug Yesus kapal hibag.

Ari ulug kapal hibagma Yesusen, "Hit hinindi sohu roho welahebon ari fahet eneg hun Musan hunuhesi umbusuk teg lahep ulug hiyag isibag. Ari ibag angge famen Allahn mun angge man angge wal tibag sambil ari roho ibag fug.
Ap ekeyen uhe subon embeselug keron hilaruk ahun inowen ap unuhesi yarog taruk ahun hag toho wereg. Ari tem toho hiyag hisaruk lahi. We hiyap yaying turukon eneg umbusuk hag teg," ibag.
Yesusen ari ibagma Otsiyen te Onowe fam enele uruk lit, "Ahun uhe men ari turuk lit welamuhup peruk lahen halug aben hiyap waruk ane embeselepma fano," ibag.
Ari ibagma Yesusen, "Anden iminon aru ap obog toho inindi anggar amuhup fug, we Allahn inindi anggarap enebuhuwon fahet uruk lahi.

Ap winon inisingasiyen unuwali eleg angge indag enepfagma unuhesi men mangno roho nohuk fug tehen hiyap hilaruk eleg. Ap winon aben unuwali og eneptukmu unuhesi men mangno roho nohuk fug tehen hiyap hilaruk eleg. Ap winon nit Allah umalikisi At weregma kuhuk ulug ininggareg inindiyen hiyap men mangno roho nohuk fug teg lahe ulug hiyap hulul fug peruk lit wereg. Ap sa indi wereg halug ihi ane ari indi anggar amag," ulug Yesusen hiyag isibag.
Welatfagma aben malik toron unubam Yesusen sembahyang uruk lit Inggik ununggulmu embemisi ulug ambeg hondog eneplug waharuk latfag. Hondog eneplug waharukmu Otsiyen ap arimano per eneptuk latfag.

Per eneptuk latfagma Yesusen, "Malik toron arima An nambeg wamag tohon hiren per enebuk fug. Allah ap obog toho Inikni aruhuwon ino malik toron aruma unubabut hag toho werehon eneg Inikni aruhu," ibag.
Ari ibareg Inggik ununggulmu emberuk lit hi enepfareg o ino embeselug wilip atfag.
Ap misig Yesus ambeg watfareg, "Nowe, an Allah ambeg kuhukteg mondabi noluk welaruhukon fahet fano ane nungge ane turuk laruhuk, Haren hiyag nimin," ibag.

Ari ibagma Yesusen, "Fano ane nungge turuk laruhuk ulug nungge fahet An kapal Neyehen? Ap we misig eneg fanowon wereg. Allah ambeg kuhukteg welaruhuk peruk lahen halug Allahn komo neneptuk ane hikit toho turuk laruhun," ibag.
Ari ibagma ap inowen, "Nungge ane fam komo neneptukon fahet ehen," ulug kapal hibagma Yesusen, "Ap unusuk fug, ap unuhesi pal ta fug, yoholiyangge hila fug, hele si ane uruk laruhun fug,
hikni men hisinga men hindi roho welaruhun, hinggareg hindi reg lahen hag toho ap winon oho hindi reg laruhun," ulug hiyag itfag.
Ari ulug hiyag itfagma ap kabiniyon inowen, "Obog toho ehenon ari hikit toho turuk latikik, napelehon eke wereg ano," ulug kapal hibag.

Ari ulug kapal hibagma Yesusen, "Mondabi fano aruhuk pehen halug lamihinteg haren angge obog toho ayeg waruhunteg ap enengge elehon ayeg waruhun angge arimano og isa lahunmu haren tohon fano angge poholma welaruhu. Poholma werehen suhuloho Nambeg waruhunmu An men ambiyeg laruk lamuhuk," ibag.
Yesusen hiyag itfag ane ari hol hibareg ap kabiniyon ino aren angge anggolo werehen indi anggin atfagma ibam mondabi pok arik libag.
Pok arik libagma Yesusen otsi fam, "Ap enengge anggolo werehon Allah wereg ambeg nangginoho kuk teg. Ari tem toho hiyag hisaruk lahi.
Wam unta oho lisu fo reg keyen kuk hag teg? Ari hag toho ap anggengge anggolo werehon Allah ambeg kuk fug teg. Ari tem toho hiyag hisaruk lahi," ibag.
Yesusen ibag ane Otsiyen hol hibareg enekol anggolo atfareg Onowe fam te, "Ari reg halug ap sa Allah wereg ambeg kuhu?" ulug kapal hibag.
Ari ulug kapal hibagma Yesusen otsi hebeloho kim isibareg hiyag isaruk lit, "Aben te tuk fug teg angge famen Allahn eneg tuk teg lit wereg," ibag.

Yesusen ari ibagma Petrusen ubam ele uruk lit, "Nowe, mun angge man angge niren tohon obog toho embeserukukteg Hat men ambiyeg laruk lahe angge re nit fahet onggo nungge og nisa reg," ulug kapal hibag.

Kapal hibagma Yesusen, "Pohol men kinang men kerap tuhu sambil At ap atik ibahon ino umbagpag turuk ambehen lehoma heriyeg laruhumu hit An men ambiyeg larikibon oho hur atuk angge nisanggowen fam heriyeg lit Israel inap ununggul unuk nisanggowen werehon ino fam unggum werehon hiren kong tuhup. Ari tem toho hiyag hisaruk lahi.

Ap sa An nunuk fahet ibam men ori erekisi men ikni isinga men umalikisi men iyabuk men embeselug An men ambiyeg lahuwon ino embeselug lahu angge arimano fahet ubalma Allahn sebe roho og uruhureg At men mondabi oluk welaruhu.
Ap anggolo arimano tamon fobik amuhupmu fobikon tam amuhup," ulug hiyag isibag.
"Allah ap obog toho Inikni aruhuwon ino ap misig yabuk ngi ahun hag toho wereg. Ap ino hubet-habet hele anggur yabuk wibusan ap mingming enepmin ulug wilip atisi.
Hiyag eneptisireg, 'Uang inggila misig og hisamin,' irisimu iren fano urusama, 'Yabuk anden toho wirik lalihip,' ulug hiyag isarisi.
Hiyag isarisireg mo lahik waharisimu nin wilip atisireg yet harukmen ap winon eke saplangge silimu wereg latusa.
Wereg latusama, 'Hir oho anggur yabuk anden tohon wirik lalihipmu onggo anden og hesele perukon og hisamin,' irisimu ir oho larusa.
Larusama welatisireg mo anum pulmu weregma ap winon eke hondog enebik oho wilip atisi. Hupmu mo haya regma nin eke ap hondog enebik oho wilip atisi.
Nin eke sinal ele ik ohoma oho wilip atisireg silimu ap anggolo luhalegma larisireg, 'Nori, hit nungge fahet fahe angge heriyeg lit welahep?' irisimu
iren te, 'Hondog nenebik wahasa fugmu welahe,' urusama aren, 'Hir oho anggur yabuk anden toho wirik lalihip,' irisi.
Mondabi hup atisimu ap inowen amingmingangge fam, 'Yabuk wituk inap wol enepmihinteg onggo og isamihin. Fobik wahason tam og isamihinteg tam wahason fobik og isamihin,' irisi.
Ari irisimu it sinal ele ik ohoma waharuson oho wal taneg uang inggila misig-misig og isarisi.
Og isarisimu it tam waharuson arimanowen, 'Nit tot anggolo og nisamisi,' perusa angge famen ir oho wal taneg uang inggila misig-misig og isarisi.
Misig-misig og isarisimu yabuk ngi ahun fam enele onolok toho uruk lit,
'It fobik wahason yabuk we tot wirehesa angge famen nit atam waheyon yabuk anggolo wituk lit molok anggolo hehe angge famen nungge fahet it nim wirim toho og nesehen,' urusa.
Ari urusama ap suwon inowen it obog toho weregma ap misig fam, 'Nare, anden siyag ane hubam tihi fug. Uang inggila misig og hitmin ihimu fano ehen anggeyen nungge fahet uruk lahen?
Haren tohon hilalug lag. An nindiyen te it fobik wahason men hit tam wahebon men ambi roho og hisamin pihireg og hisihi.
An nanggengge nindiyen ap og isa fug teg lahi? Anden ap nindi enesug lahi ane fahet holok haruk lahen?' ulug pet tirisi.
Ari hag toho ap fobikon atam amuhupmu ap atamon fobik amuhup," ulug Yesusen hiyag isibag.
Yesus o Yerusalem lahakuk ulug kema laruk lit Otsi nisanggowen enemu hondog enepfareg hiyag isaruk lit,
"Ketiya nit o Yerusalem luk oho lahe. Lahakukmu At ap kinangmon atfahon ino imam usane onoluk inap men Musa wene onoluk inap men ininggikmu og isahupmu pinggi ware fusukag ulug unggum Ubam umbuhup.
Ubam umbuhupteg Allah unuk enepeleg inap ininggikmu umbuhupmu Inggaliyap turuk lit Ebe siyag toho wabuhupteg e fam tele fesuhupmu At o hinahaneg angge Oluk aruhu," ulug Otsi hiyag isibag.
Zebedeus uhe inowen Yesus fam heng angge heng timin ulug umalikisi men Ambeg watfareg Alukema hur atfag.

Hur atfagma Yesusen, "Nungge heng Napmin ulug wahen?" ibagma hiyap inowen, "Nowe, Hat palimuwap Habuhu ambehen an numaliki ariya misihon ninggik pikit fil misihon ninggik hare fil hur arik maniyek uhunen hiyag hitmin ulug wahi," ibag.
Ari ibagma Yesusen, "Heng Nabehep ane ari henepelehen ehep. Ik kubag Anden nahukon ari fam hir oho nenggep ha reg lahep?" ulug umung isibagma iren te, "Nir oho nengge ha reg lahe," ibag.

Ari ibagma Yesusen te, "Ik kubag Anden nahukon ari hiren oho nahup angge famen ninggik pikit fil hare fil hur arik maniyek uruk ane ari Anden uk fug teg lahi. Nikniyen unubale hale fuhureg tiya hur arik maniyek ulug Aren perukon eneg wol enebuhu," ibag.
Ibag ane ari Otsi numen itano hol hibareg onolok haruk lit ap piren itano per enepfag.

Per enepfagma Yesusen wol enepfareg hiyag isaruk lit, "Ap suwon kema-kema werehon onotsi enele ine roho apmayap eneptuk ane hit honoluk. Ap suwon it sen enesug inap arimanowen oho enele ine roho onotsi mingming enebil laruk.
Hiren oho ari roho tuhup fug. Hit sehelimuwon misihen an suwon welaruhuk peruk halug at ino henemingmingangge amag.
Hit sehelimuwon misihen an palimu aruhuk peruk halug at ino henemingmingangge wereg lit let heneptuk laruhu.

At ap kinangmon atik ibahon ino hiren At let tuhuben waharisi fug, Aren hit let heneptuk laruhuk ulug waharisi. Aren ap anggolo windar enebuhuk ulug Inggarehen oho Nuwabukag peruk," ulug Yesusen hiyag isibag.
Yesus otsi men o Yerikho embeselug kema larukmen ap anggolo mondeg angge Yesus ombolim laruk latfag.
Ombolim larukmen ap inil hupnihon piren funggalem ilanma heriyeg lit Yesus it pisan isalug laruk urukmu hol hibareg enele hi roho, "Nonowe, Hat Daud amloho welahenma nit Hindi nisimin," uruk latfag.

Ari uruk latfagma ap anggolo arimanowen henele imbisiyek ulug per eneptuk latfag. Per eneptuk latfag angge famen enele nin eke hi roho uruk lit, "Nonowe, Hat Daud amloho nit Hindi nisimin," uruk latfag.
Ari uruk latfagma Yesus in atfareg tiya maniyek ulug wol enepfag. Watfagma Yesusen, "Nungge nunubam timisi ulug uruk lahep," ulug kapal isibagma
iren te, "Nonowe, ninil fano alepma yet haruk lala peruk lit uruk lahe," ibag.
Ari ibagma Yesusen indi isibareg inilmu Inggik tung harukmu inil fano atfag. Fano atfareg yet haruk latfareg Yesus men ambiyeg laruk latfag.
Yesus otsi men o Yerusalem horogma o Betfage zaitun punu fam wirigmu ino libag. Libareg Otsi piren tam lalihip ulug mon enepfag.
Mon eneptuk lit, "Heneluke fil o pumbuk wirigmu lalihipteg yet halihipteg wam keledai isinga misig kumbi ililigmu umalik iraham weregma lalihip. Isinga ino loltihipteg pirenet Nambeg walug watihip.
Ap ekeyen, 'Wam ari nungge fahet loltuk lahep,' uruk halug hiren at ubam, 'Nonowe sehet teg lit wak aliyek ulug mon nenebehek,' ilihipmu walug aliyek ulug og hisamisi," ibag.
Tibag ane alem aru atam wene hiyag isaruk latfag ahunen haharoho imbibag ane hikir amag ulug tibag. Imbibag ane aru,

"Sion hilani malik ino wene hiyag umuhubon te tu: Honowe suwon henembeg waharukmu yet teg lamok. Indi wiyig teg lit wam keledai misig emberimu heriyegma waharuk. Wam keledai anggin angge ha rurukon umalik kabiniyon emberimu heriyegma waharuk."
Yesusen ari ulug Otsi mon enepfagma it libareg onoweyen hiyag isibag ane hikit toho
keledai ino lolfareg umalik men walug watfag. Walug watfareg enesum nonggoloho Yesus hur atmisi ambeg ulug keledai emberimu tuwale fibagma Yesus keledai palimu hur arik lahibag.
Hur arik lahibagma larukmen ap anggolo arimano luhaleg lit enesum nonggoloho kebunggalma Yesus watmisi ke ulug tuwaltil larukmu winonen te e inggik sombo roho funggalem ke tuwaltil laruk latfag.

Ap anggolo Yesus aluke fil Ambol fil miyaloho laruk latfahon arimanowen enele hi roho uruk lit, "Daud amloho Hat wel Haptuk lahe, Ninikni Allahn mon Haptisimu waharuk lahenon hi Haptuk lahe, lehoma welahenon wel Haptuk lahe," uruk latfag.
Ari il larukmu Yesus o Yerusalem kibagma Yerusalem inap obog toho ngik-ngog tibareg enele sahaltuk lit, "Ap tu sa waha," uruk latfag.
Ari uruk lit, "Tu Allahn monde ferisiyon Yesus Nazaret o Galilea wereg ahun ino waha," ulug enele sahaltuk latfag.
Yesus Allah ibam kibareg onggo paloho ayeg waroho waruk inap yanggal eneptuk lit uang hunduko emberuk ambeg e tuwalehon hebel isibareg suwe yalma ayeg waroho emberuk ambeg tel isibag.
Tel isibareg hiyag isaruk lit, "An nibam tu sembahyang uruk ibam wereg ulug haharoho imbibag angge famen hiren te ap siyag ane turuk lit enebe unusulug enengge hilaruk inap inibamap tirikip," ibag.
Ari ulug yanggal enepfareg weregman ap inil siyahon men unuyug siyahon men Allah ibam ino Ambeg waharukmu Yesusen hihir eneptuk latfag.

Hihir eneptukmu malik toron Allah ibam welatfahon arimanowen yet hibareg fano ane Aren turuk ulug, "Hat Daud amloho welahenon wel Haptuk lahe," uruk latfag. Ari uruk latfagma imam usa inap onowesi men Musa wene onoluk inap menen Yesusen tibag ane men maliken ibag ane men kim hibareg enehummu siyag atfareg

enele uruk lit, "Malik toron aruman uruk ane Hat holtuk lahen?" ulug kapal hibagma Yesusen hebeloho it unubam hiyag isaruk lit, "An holtuk lahi. Malik ag narukon sum fam fani roho werehon arimanowen sini yunggultuk lit Allah wel tuhup ulug haharoho imbibahon harikip fug?" ibag.
Ari ibareg Yesus o inowen it embeselug wilip atfareg o pumbuk Betania ino libareg nohibag.
Nohibareg likiya Yerusalem suhuloho watnin ulug kema waharukmen Yesus suburu obok turuk latfag.

Obok turuken kema laruk lit yet harukmen e ara soluk hag ahen misig weregma yet hibareg anggen namin ulug iraham larukmen e ino anggen elegman inggila eneg welatfag. Welatfagma e ino fam, "Anggen uk fug angge weregman eneg mo ilig am wirig am turuk laruhu," ulug pet tibag. Ari urukmu itano e ino ilim atfag.
E ino ilim atfagma Otsiyen yet hibareg enekol haruk lit, "Nangginoho e ara aru folo-folo ilim aha?" ibagma

Yesusen, "Hinindi piren teg eleg angge tem toho wenggel haruk lamuhup halug Anden e aru pet tihi hag toho hiren oho ari hag toho tuk teg lamuhup. Ari tor angge fam wal haruk lahe. Tom aru halog toho ik yenggelehon ahummu wambin uhupmu oho teko lahu. Ari tem toho hiyag hisaruk lahi.
Mun angge man angge fahet hinindimu tem toho peruk lit Hinikni fam heng turuk lamuhupmu Aren hit og hisahu," ibag.

Yesus Allah ibam kibareg wene hiyag isarukmu imam usa inap onowesi men Yahudi inap iniknisi men arimano Yesus ambeg watfareg kapal haruk lit, "Haren mun ane man ane turuk lahenon ari ap san hineyap Haptuk lit holukap Haptukmu turuk lahen?" ulug kapal hibag.

Ari ulug kapal hibagma Yesusen, "Anden oho hit hunubam il misig kapal hisamin. Anden kapal hisaminon fahet hebeloho hiyag Nitihip halug Anden oho nineyap Naptukmu mun ane man ane turuk lahiyon fahet hiyag hisamin.

Yohanes ap ikma pilap eneptuk latisi ahun ino poholman waharisi ano, ap kinangmonen turuk latisi ano," ulug kapal isibag. Ari ulug kapal isibagma it-it enemu enele sahaltuk lit, "Poholman waharisi ul halug nungge fahet at ele holtikip fug ik ohoreg.
Ap kinangmonen turuk latisi ul halug ap aruman pet nenebuk ohoreg. Ap anggolo aruman Yohanes Allahn monde ferisimu waharisi peruk angge re nenekol toho welahe," peruk lit it-it enele sahalfareg
Yesus fam te, "Nit nenepeleg," ibag. Ari ibagma Yesusen it unubam te, "Nenepeleg ehepma Anden oho An nineyap Naptukmu mun ane man ane turuk lahiyon ino fahet hiyag hisamin fug," ibag.

Yesusen wene eke hiyag isaruk lit, "Anden wene misig hiyag hisaminon fahet hiren nungge pelihip? Ap misig umalikisi piren welatusa. Misihim amloho wandabon ambeg larisireg, 'Namloho anggur yabuk anden tohon yoho wirik lamihin,' irisi.
Ari irisimu hun ino amlohowen, 'Nikni, fano,' irisi angge famen malik ino yabuk wirik larisi fug.

Wirik larisi fugmu fobik hun ino amloho fobikon ambeg larisireg, 'Namloho, anggur yabuk anden toho wirik lamihin,' ulug ot fam oho ari ik larisi. Ari ik larisimu malik inowen, 'Nirim,' irisi. Ari irisireg nin indi wenggel harisireg nikni ele imbisihi ulug fobik yabuk wirik larisi," ulug Yesusen hiyag isibag.

Hiyag isibareg, "Ikniyen irisi ane fuki roho san tirisi peruk lahep?" ulug kapal isibag. Ari ulug kapal isibagma iren te, "Fobikonen inikni ele holtisi," ibag. Ari ibagma Yesusen te, " Pemerintah amingmingangge men hiyap yaying turukon men siyag-siyag ane turuk angge famen Allah weregma it tam kuhup, hit fobik amuhup. Ari we tem toho hiyag hisaruk lahi.

Yohanes ap ikma pilap eneptuk latisi ahun ino kebunggalem fanowon hiyag hisik oho waharisi angge famen ele nale feserikip. Pemerintah amingmingangge men hiyap yaying turukon men siyag ane anggolo turusa angge famen Yohanes ele holtusa. Hiren te at hinilen harikip angge famen fobik tem toho uruk ulug hinindi wenggel harikip fureg ele nale feserikip," ulug Yesusen hiyag isibag.

"Wene eke indit toho hiyag hisaminon fahet holeg lamok. Ap misihen anggur yabuk eke witisireg elehet walinggoho kilaptisi. Ahaluwe pete roho kilaptuk ambeg ulug kinang fo roho habuli ferisireg yabuk foroho ahun fahet e pila ribik laharisi. Pila ribik laharisireg yabuk aru foroho lamuhup ulug ap hiyag isarisireg o winama larisi.
Larisireg wereg lit anggur anggen tahantuk li waharuk perisireg foroho inaben anggen eke minggiroho numbahakup ulug amingmingangge mon eneptisi.
Mon eneptisimu foroho inaben amingmingangge arimano sen eneptusareg eke yik angge ware feserusa, eke pinggi ware feserusareg nin eke helep fam pinggi ware feserusa.
Unusurusa angge famen yabuk ngi ahun inowen amingmingangge nin tot anggolo mon eneptuk latisimu atamon unusurusa hag toho fobikon oho unusuruk latusa.
Unusuruk latusama amloho monde feruk lit at fahet enekolen wabusa fug ulug monde ferisi.
Monde ferisimu yabuk foroho inap arimanowen malik ino waharukmu yet harusareg it-it enele uruk lit, 'Yabuk fobik ngi aruhu ahun tu waharuk, yabuk ari nit ngi amuhuken at ware fusul,' urusa.
Ari il laruk lit senetusareg elehet sel fil hik isarusareg pinggi ware feserusa.
Yabuk ngi ahun ino waruhureg yabuk foroho inap arimano nanggin enebuhu?" ulug Yesusen kapal isibagma
iren te, "Ap siyag ane turuk latuson arimano waroho yanggal eneptuk lit ap winon fam yabuk ino hiyag isahumu iren anggen tahantuk li tahanoho ngi ahun ino og utuk lamuhup," ibag.
Ari ibagma Yesusen, "Olun waruk inaben helep siyag tohon tu ulug hik isaruson ino ubule yag atisi, ari Ninikniyen nit nonolohotma turukmu yet haruk lahe. Aru atam haharoho imbibahon harikip fug?
Allah wereg ambeg ino hit hininggikmuwen taluk toho ap winon anggen fanowon urukon og isahumu iren ngi amuhup. Ari tem toho hiyag hisaruk lahi.

Ap eke helep ubule ino fam uyug kik turuk lit mako wambuhureg uyug fala roho uwag lilibug toho lin uhu. Helep inowen ap ino hondo ruhu halug ap ino lilibug toho kinang aruhu," ulug Yesusen ap arimano hiyag isibag.
Hiyag isibagma imam usa inap onowesi men Farisi inap men Yesusen indit toho ehekon ari nit fahet ehek ulug inindi anggar atfagma
at senebulteg wabul pibag angge famen ap anggolo aruman Yesus fahet Allahn monde ferisiyon wereg peruk ulug enekolen imbisibag.
Yesusen wene eke indit toho hiyag isaruk lit,
"Allah ap obog toho Inikni aruhuwon ino ap suwon misig hag toho wereg. Ap suwon ino amlohowen hiyap hilarisimu seni esetmin perisireg

namlohowen hiyap helehekon fahet seni esetminen ap atam hiyag isarikikon seni aru na wamusan hondog enebik lalihip ulug amingmingangge mon eneptisi. Mon eneptisi angge famen ap arimano ninirim ulug pok atusa.

Pok atusama amingmingangge winon eke mon eneptuk lit, 'Tam wamuhup irikikon enembeg lalihipteg hiyag isaruk lit wam sapi men senggeloho suwe pak men suburu men mangno roho eserihiyon aruma an yahaltukmu wamusa ehek ulug hiyag isa lalihip,' irisireg mon eneptisi.
Mon eneptisimu ap wol eneptisiyon arimanowen lul fug perusareg winon iniyabuk fahet wilip atusama winon ininggarehen tohon fahet pok atusa.
It winonen amingmingangge itano sen eneptusareg enele ying eneptuk lit waroho lahap eneptusareg pinggi unusurusa.
Unusurusama inikni ino indimu olok harisireg otsi sehen seneg inap unubam namingmingangge unuseheson fahet ap unusuruk lit inibam harep pisatihip ulug mon eneptisi.
Mon eneptisireg amingmingangge fam, 'Namlohowen hiyap helehekma seni eserihireg yahale fihi angge famen ap wol enebihiyon arimano siyag ane tehesama seni aru na fug teg.
Ari fahet ke handuhal teg ambeg lalihipteg weregma ap larukmu isalihibon hondog eneptug watlihipmu seni eserihiyon nalusa,' irisi.

Ari irisimu larusareg ap obog toho ke handuhal teg ambeg larukmu yer isaruson arimano siyag ane turuk inap men fano ane turuk inap men palu eneptusareg hondog eneplug waharusama seni esetisi ibam ino ap pohonen keleg irisi.
Ap suwon inowen pohon arimano yer isamin ulug kirisireg yer isarukmen ap misig sum fanowon wan teg eleg angge welatisi.
Welatisimu ap suwon inowen, 'Nare, sum fanowon wan tehen fug angge famen nangginoho tuma kik wahen?' irisimu ap ino ele eleg angge welatisi.

Ele eleg angge welatisimu ap suwon inowen amingmingangge fam, 'Ap aru inggik men uyug men hele fam pug tebelihipteg mondabi hik teg ambeg hik isa lalihipmu uba yatuk lit ayeg kilit matuk lit welaruhu,' irisi.
Ap anggolo wol eneptisi angge famen tor angge eneg mumal eneptisi," ulug Yesusen hiyag isibag.
Welatfagma Farisi inap palu ribareg Yesusen imisi ane ari fam alem Ubam umbuhukteg wabuhuken yoho kapal haruk lit aluwat hul ulug enele sahaltuk latfag.

Enele sahaltuk latfareg Farisi inap onotsi men Herodes otsi men mon enepfagma Yesus ambeg libareg kapal haruk lit, "Nonowe, Hat hindi wirik toho welahenon ari nit nonoluk. Allahn komo eneptukon hag toho eneg ap hiyag isaruk lit ap unubam Hakol eleg toho siyag ane ehek, fano ane ehek ulug iren pelusa puk fug anggeyen uruk lahen.
Haren peruk lahenon hiyag nisimin: Ap suwon Kaisar inowen uang heng neneptikim og um teg ano, og um fug teg ano?" ulug kapal hibag.
Ari ulug kapal haruk lit it unundaman peruk latfag ane Yesus tam Oluk atfareg Ele uruk lit, "Hit henele si uruk hinap, nungge fahet An wal Niyaruk lahep?
Uang Kaisar fahet emberukon misig An nubam unug hemek," ibagma iren uang anggen misig unug hibag.
Unug hibagma Yesusen kapal isaruk lit, "Orohole ilit tehon men unuk haharehon men ap sa unuk hahareg lit wereg?" ibagma
iren te, "Kaisaren tohon hahareg," ibag. Ari ibagma Yesusen, "Kaisar og um hahon Kaisar og umuhup. Allah og um hahon Allah og umuhup," ibag.
Ibag ane aru hol hibareg enekolen Yesus embeselug libag.
Welatfagma o ino sambil Saduki inaben ap war atukon Allahn onolukap enebuhu fug peruk inap Yesus ambeg watfag.

Watfareg kapal haruk lit, "Nonowe, Musan nit fahet haharoho imbibahon te, 'Ap misig umalik indag ta fug angge uhe tuhum weregma lin isalug war atukmu areyen nowe ubalmangge malik enderuhuk ulug hiyap ino hilahu,' ulug haharoho imbibag ane fahet niren kapal Huyul," ibag.
"Inikni misihen ondohowon ap sabiren nit sehelimu welatusa. Onowe wandabon ino hiyap hilarisireg weregman war atisi. Ubalmangge eke endebuk fug anggeyen war atisimu uhe ino ot fahet lin teberisi.
Otsi pirenehon hinahanehon oho ari roho hiyap inowen og enebil larukmen sabiren obog toho war atusa.
It obog toho itano war atil larikim hiyap ino oho war atisi.
Hiyap ino it sabiren itanowen oho latusa angge re Allahn ap warehon onolukap enebuhu sambil hiyap ino san hilahu?" ulug kapal hibag.
Ari ulug kapal hibagma Yesusen te, "Hit un ke laruk hinap haharoho imbibahon henepeleg toho welahebon ariyen Allah ine werehon ino eke henepeleg.
Allahn ap warehon onolukap enebuhu sambil ino aben hiyap heleheg hiyaben ap heleheg turuk ane eleg laruhumu Allah otsi malaikat wereg hag toho welamuhup.
Ap warehon Allahn onolukap enebuhu ane fahet Allahn ibag ane iminon tu haharoho imbibahon irikip fug?

Allahn ele uruk lit, 'Abraham Ikni An welahi, Ishak Ikni An welahi, Yakub Ikni An welahi,' ibag. Ibag ane aru Allah ap warehon Inikni wereg eleg, ap onoluk werehon Inikni wereg," ulug Yesusen hiyag isibag.
Ari ulug hiyag isibagma ap anggolo arimano hiyag isibag ane fahet enekol hibag.
Yesusen Saduki inap ininggaliyap enepfagma enele uk fug angge weregma Farisi inaben yer isibareg it luhal arik watfag.
Luhal arik watfareg it sehelimuwen Musa wene oluk ahun misihen At wal hul ulug kapal haruk lit,
"Nowe, wene atam Musan haharoho imbibahon te keyon palimu reg," ibagma
Yesusen te, "Hikni Allah hindimuwen hindi reg lit hahime men hebe obog tohowen hindi reg laruhun
ulug komo enepfag ane aru eneg palimu wereg peruk lahi.
Pirenehon ari hag toho werehon te tu imin: Hinggareg hindi reg lit welahen hag toho ap winon hindi enesug laruhun.
Alem piren ariya eneg palimu werehen Musa wene oho atam Allah wene hiyag isaruk latfahon oho ihiyon tu apma wereg," ulug hiyag isibag.
Farisi inap palu roho weregma Yesusen it kapal isaruk lit,
"Hiren Mesias fahet nungge peruk lahep? At ino ap sa amloho wereg peruk lahep?" ibagma iren te, "Daud amloho wereg," ulug hiyag Itfag.
Hiyag Itfagma Yesusen hebeloho kapal isaruk lit, "Ari reg halug Daud ino Allah hime fanowon inowen let turukmu aren ele hiyag isaruk lit nangginoho Mesias fam Nikni uk hag teg latfag.
Dauren ibag ane iminon tu, 'Nikni Allahn an Nikni fam Ele uruk lit Hat men seli roho werehon arimano Huyug apma umbuhuken Ninggik pikit fil tuma hur arik ma,' ulug Dauren ari ibag.
Daud inowen ele uruk lit, 'Nikni,' ibag angge famen Ikni ino nangginoho nin Amloho am teg?" ulug Yesusen kapal isibag.
Kapal isibag ane fahet ap misihen oho hebeloho Yesus hiyag Um fug teg latfag. O ino sambil oho o wina sambil oho ap misihen oho ambong se roho kapal ha fug teg latfag.
Yesusen ap anggolo arimano men Otsi men hiyag isaruk lit,
"Musa wene onoluk inap men Farisi inap men arimanowen Musa ubalmangge nit welahe peruk.
Ari fahet iren enele hiyag hisarukon holtuk lit fuki roho turuk lamuhup angge famen ininggik fam iren turukon ari hag toho hiren turuk lamuhup fug. Enele fam uruk angge famen ininggik fam turuk eleg.
Sum angginon het toho ap ununggulmu emberuk anggeyen ininggareg ininggiken tor angge oho sen haruk eleg.
Iren turukon ari fano ane turuk lahema aben yet nisalug wel nenebukag peruk lit turuk. Niren sembahyang urukmu aben yet nisawag ulug sohomanggen anggeyon men sum yaron men wan toho sembahyang uruk.
Iren seni esetuk ambehen oho lehoma hur amul peruk lit sembahyang uruk ibamen oho olohotma hur amul peruk.
Ayeg waroho waruk ambeg wereg inaben hi neneptuk lit niniknisi nonowesi ulug wel nenebukag ulug lehoma in atuk.
Nori, hit-hit hi-hi atuk lit, 'Nonowe, nonowe,' uruk lamuhup fug. Honowe we misig eneg weregma hit are men are men hag toho welahep.
Hiren ap kinangmon hi ruruk lit, 'Ninikni,' uruk lamuhup fug. We Hinikni misig poholmon ino eneg wereg, At ubam Ninikni uruk lamuhup.
Hiren hininggareg fahet milal neneptukon tu wereg uruk lamuhup fug. We hit milal heneptukon Mesias ino wereg.
Hit sehelimu an suwon welahi perukon ino henemingmingangge amag.
Ap san inggareg palimuwap tarukon ino apma aruhumu ap san inggareg apmayap tarukon ino palimu aruhu.

Hit Musa wene honoluk hinap men Farisi hinap men hinindi anggin amag. Hit henele si uruk lit Allah ibam kul perukon onolohotma sok latuk lahep. Hit hininggareg kuk fug teg lahebonen ap winon kul perukon sok hembit keleg tebeseruk lahep.

Hit Musa wene honoluk hinap men Farisi hinap men hinindi anggin amag. Hit henele si uruk hinap suburu enebit naruk hag toho hiyap yuwohon enenggengge inibam werehon feleng toho hilaruk lit aben fano helehesa ukag ulug sembahyang yaron il laruk lahebon alem angginon hunubam aruhumu mondabi siyag amuhup.

Hit Musa wene honoluk hinap men Farisi hinap men hinindi anggin amag. Hit henele si uruk hinaben te ap misig nonot aruhureg wene niren tohon kuhu ulug ik yenggelehon paltil tom luhatil laruk lit ap eke hiyaharuk lahep halug siyahon umalikap turukmu hiren siyag ane turuk lahebon se regma aren turukon mondabi anggin teg.

Hininggareg hinil hupnig angge famen ap hondog eneptuk lahe peruk lahebon ari hinindi anggin amag. Allah ibam fam tik-tem toho ihi ulug aben uruk halug sali ari pisan tuk teg uruk lahep. Allah ibam ili ruruk angge fam tik tem toho ihi ulug aben uruk halug sali ari pisan tuk fug teg uruk lahep.
Hit hinindi sohu rohon men hinil hupnihon men, Allah ibam palimu wereg ano, ili ruruk angge ino palimu wereg ano? Umbagpag turuk angge ino Allah ibamen fanowap turuk.
Hubu lahaptuk ambeg ino fam tik-tem toho ihi ulug aben uruk halug sali ari pisan tuk teg uruk lahep. Esetuk angge fam tik-tem toho ihi ulug aben uruk halug sali ari pisan tuk fug teg uruk lahep.
Hit hinil hupnig hinap, nungge palimu wereg: Hubu lahaptuk ambeg ano, esetuk angge ano? Hubu lahaptuk ambeg inowen esetuk angge fanowap turuken hubu lahaptuk ambeg palimu wereg.
Hubu lahaptuk ambeg fam tik-tem toho uruk ahun ino hubu lahaptuk ambeg men esetuk angge men fam sali emberuk.
Allah ibam fam tik-tem toho uruk ahun ino Allah ibam men o ino fam wereg Ahun men fam sali emberuk.
Pohol fam tik-tem toho ihi uruk ahun ino Allah hur atuk ambeg men hur atuk Ahun men fam sali emberuk.

Hit Musa wene honoluk hinap men Farisi hinap men hinindi anggin amag. Hit henele si uruk hinaben pingga men kami men amben fano angge ayeg waroho hilalug onggo og hisarukon palu numen tebelug numon ino Allah fahet emberuk lahep. Musa wene fam apma werehon hiren palimuwap turuk lahep, palimu werehon apmayap turuk lahep. Pikir ane turukon men ap hinindi enesuhon men hinindi wirik toho werehon men apmayap feseruk lahep. Eke ane turuk lit eke ane embeseruk lamuhup fug.
Hininggareg hinil hupnig angge famen ap hondog eneptuk lahe peruk lahep. Elemiyaha ik fam werehon filig toho hik isalug wam sapi hum angge famen abir angge henenggolobag ele ke kilaptuk lahep.

Hit Musa wene honoluk hinap men Farisi hinap men hit henele si uruk lahebon hinindi anggin amag. Kubag ik naruk angge men suburu narukon iya ruruk angge men sel fil werehon puhun toho umatuk lit undama fil henebuwaben yoholiyangge hilaruk lahebon arimano keleg toho weregma naruk lahep.
Hit Farisi hinap hinil hupnig lit welahebon, kubag ik naruk angge undama fil tam kul oho fuhupmu sel fil oho fano aruhu.

Hit Musa wene honoluk hinap men Farisi hinap men hit henele si uruk hinap hinindi anggin amag. Ap yal eneptukon amigmu elehet fano roho oko kilabeg lit hohol sel fil fano roho uruk angge famen undama fil ap uwag imbaluwal eneg het teg lit wereg. Ari hag toho hit nim wirim teg.
Henehap sel fil aben yet hisalug ap fanowon tuma wereg peruk angge famen hunundaman henele si uruk lit sibiling-sibiling ane uruk hinap welahep.

Hit Musa wene honoluk hinap men Farisi hinap men hit henele si uruk hinap hinindi anggin amag. Allah wene tam hiyag isaruk latfag inap sal enepfag ambeg hiren siye teberuk lit fano ane turuk latfag inap sal enepfag ambeg ungga fanowon sale feruk lahep.
Sale felug henele uruk lit, 'Nit ninikni umba welatfag li welala hahen ap atam wene hiyag isaruk latfag inap niren unusila fug,' uruk lahep.
Ari uruk lahebon ariyen atam hiyag isaruk inap unusibahon arimano unubalmangge nit welahe ulug fag toho uruk lahep.
Hit hinikni umban atam enesum sukun taruk latfahon hag toho hiren oho sukun taruk lamuhup.
Hit pisanggo umalikisi, imbalo puwami umalikisi, indok humon hunubam aruhumu nangginoho windat taruk lamuhup?

Yet teg lamok, hit henembeg Anden wene hiyag hisaruk inap men inindi anggat teg lit wene alem onoluk inap men mon eneptuk laruhuk. Mon eneptuk laruhukmu hiren winon pinggi unusuruk lit e fam tel eneptuk lamuhup. Winon wene uruk ibamen e paleg fam unusuruk lit winon o eke la eke la turukmu unusul ulug mug eneplug laruk lamuhup.

Hun Habel ino siyag ane tibag fug angge famen ap unusil laruk ane at famen ak tibareg unusil laruk lit ketiya Berekia amloho Zakharia ino Allah ibam honggoleg wam esetuk ambeg honggoleg pulmu itanowen hiren ware feserikipmu enemep ari fahet ayeg waroho hit hunusuhup.
Ap ketiya werehon aruma unubam ihi ane ari tem toho aruhu ulug hiyag hisaruk lahi."

Yesusen ele uruk lit, "Yerusalem hinap Nindiyen ulug hunubam uruk lahi. Wene hiyag hisaruk inap Allahn henembeg mon enebik waharisi angge famen helep fam unusil laruk lahep. Suwe ayam umaliki aherabul apma wol toho kilap eneptuk hag toho Anden hat humalikisi wol toho kilap enepmin perikik angge famen ninirim irikip.
Ninirim irikipmu hinibam aru ap eleg laruhumu ofoluk aruhu.

Ketiya famen hiren An niyahup fuhon fahet tem toho hiyag hisaruk lahi. 'Ninikni Allahn mon Haptisiyon waharuk lahenon tu wel Haptuk lahe,' ulug hiren uhup sambil eneg Niyahup," ulug Yesusen Yerusalem inap hiyag isibag.
Wene ari obog toho hiyag isibareg Allah ibamen wilip atug laruk latfag. Larukmen Otsiyen o Allah ibam wirihon aruma kim hamihin ulug hiyag Itfag.

Hiyag Itfagma Yesusen otsi hiyag isaruk lit, "Hiren obog toho yet haruk lahebon aruma helep misig oho eke palimu welaruhu fug, obog halog toho wambuhumu mondabi siyag aruhu. Ari tem toho hiyag hisaruk lahi," ibag.

Yesus zaitun punumu lahibareg heriyegma Otsiyen nenemu nenele ul ulug Ambeg watfag. Watfareg, "Fahe hiyag nesehen ane ari no sambil teko lahu ane fahet ehen? Hat waruhun sambil men pohol kinang eleg aruhu sambil men enehangge nungge fam nit tam nonoluk aruhu?" ibag.
Ari ibagma Yesusen hiyag isaruk lit, "Ke hare roho larukon fahet aben hinindi ninap henebuhup tohon yet teg lamok.
Ap anggolo arimanowen enele si uruk lit An nunuk il waharuk lit, 'An Mesias waharuk lahi,' ulug ap anggolo inindi ninap enebuhup.

Ap tog aptuk lit pin unusuruk urukon holuhupteg hinindimu henekol toho wereg lamuhup fug. Obog toho tuhup ane ari Allahn tam pibahon teko lahu. Teko lahuwon fahet pohol kinang ketiya eleg atmisi puk fug.
O pumbuk ekeyen te o pumbuk eke min tog aptuk lamuhup. Ap ekeyen te ap eke min seli roho welamuhup. Umu fil men ahamu fil men o mek waharuk lit suburu obok eke inam aruhu.
Hiyaben malik indag tik oho lit ak turuk lit ahum fato ruruk hag toho ap arimano siyag amuhup.
An nunuk fahet alem hunubam emberuk lit aben sen henebuhupteg pinggi hunusuruk lit ap obog tohowen hit fahet ninirim peruk lamuhup.
Ap anggolo owe or oho wereg angge famen inindi nin atikim ininggareg onori fahet ninirim peruk lit unusukag ulug huruwe laruk lamuhup.
Ap anggolo waharuk lit enele si ane nit Allah wene hiyag hisaruk ninap ulug ap anggolo ke hareyon hiyag isaruk lit inindi ninap eneptuk.
Onolok ane turukon su atuk lit ap inindi enesug ane mondabi sun aruhu.
Ap san fobik aruhu ane fahet indi wirik toho welaruhu halug at ino Allahn fanowap tuhu.
Allah ap obog toho Inikni aruhuwon fahet wene o pumbuk munon-manon obog toho hiyag isahupmu ap obog toho holuhupmu eneg pohol kinang eleg aruhu."

"Suwesingga aru uruk ahunen indimu oluk teg lit welaruhu. Nabi Daniel atam haharoho imbibahon hikit toho Allah ibam fanowon ino fam siyag angge mun angge man angge siyahap turukon unduhukmu yet hahupteg
ap o Yudea welamuhubon arimano longgo ul ulug folo-folo punumu lahakup.
Silimu o palimu heriyeg lit welaruhuwon at anggengge olma werehon hilamin ulug kuhu fug.
Yabukmu welaruhuwon ino nasum hilamin ulug olma lahu fug.
Siyag aruhu sambil ino hiyap malik forohowon men ag mon tarukon men inindi anggin toho welamuhup.
Hit longgo ul ulug lahup sambil ino sun wereg li men wene uruk sambil men lahup tohon sembahyang uruk lamuhup.
Pohol kinang wal tibag sambilen tibag fug ane nit ketiya welaheyon fobik welamuhubon ari hag toho tuhu fug angge famen we misihim sambil ino eneg alem angginon ap unubam aruhu.

Alem angginon unubam weregma amusun toho welalep angge famen Allahn il horohap tuhu. Horohap tuhu fug halug ap misig oho fano welaruhu fug. An numalikisi mumal tarikikon fano welamag ulug Allahn alem angginon ino il horohap tuhu.
Ari tuhu sambil ino ap ekeyen hiyag hisaruk lit, 'Yet hemek, Mesias ino tuma wereg, lumu wereg,' uruk halug tem toho uruk puk fug.

Ap enele si uruk inap waharuk lit, 'An Mesias ino waharuk lahi, an wene hiyag hisaruk nahun nabi waharuk lahi,' il wamuhupteg poholmonen turuk ane til ap hihir enebil wamuhup. Ari til waharuk lit Allahn mumal eneptisiyon oho ke hareyon hiyag isaruk lit inindi ninap enebuhuk puhup.
Iren tuhup ane Anden tam hiyag hisihi angge re hinindi anggat toho welamuhup.
It wamuhubon arimanowen, 'At ino farema werehen yet ha aliyek!' uruk halug hit la fug. 'O aru werehen kim halihiben kiyek!' uruk halug tem toho ehesa puk fug.
Lebeglu yali filen lek haruk lit asinandi hubula fil seleg turuk hag toho At ap kinangmon atfahon ino waruhu.
Sobon men pamo men enele ngu ruruk halug ari amben angge ita wereg," ulug Yesusen hiyag isibag.
"Alem angginon ino ap unubam aruhumu mo kun atuk lit pikalem hik aruhureg suhal poholman loloho wambuhupmu pohol ine werehon oho yuk tuhu.

Yuk tuhu sambil ino At ap kinangmon atfahon warik oho lit enehangge poholma tam inam aruhumu ap kinangmon obog toho enekolen ya nga uruk lamuhup. Ya nga uruk lit poholma lahap harukmen At ap atik ibahon ino Ebe ine roho il umbagpag toho o hina apmane waharukmu yet hahup.

Waruk ele hum toho tung-tang tirikim itano At inowen Otsi malaikat mon enebuhumu Allahn mumal eneptisiyon arimano ik eleruk fil ambut fil werehon men yali fil hubula fil werehon men pohol atogma kinang atogma werehon arimano obog toho palu arik wamuhup.
Sak fam wirim haruk lit iminon ari hinindi anggar amag. Sak alit anggolo yinggiltukmu sak li warik ohoreg ulug honoluk atuk.
Hiyag hisihi ane ari hikit toho turukmu yet hahupteg ketiya sok horogma warik ohoreg ulug hit honoluk aruhu.
Ap ketiya werehon aruma uwan eleg am fugmu Anden hiyag hisihi ane aru teko lahu. Ari tem toho hiyag hisaruk lahi.
Pohol men kinang men eleg aruhu angge famen Anden nele uruk lahi ane ari eleg aruhu fug.
Ihi ane teko lahuwon ke sambil tuhu ulug ap misihen oho oluk teg eleg. Malaikat poholma werehon men Allah amloho men enepeleg teg lit weregma we Ikni eneg Amu oluk teg."
"Ap kinangmon atfahon ino waruhu sambil ari indam hun Nuh umalikisi unubam atfahon ino hikit toho aruhu.
Ik humon ari yenggeluk fugmu ap arimano suburu nenggeg ik nenggeg aben hiyap heleheg hiyaben ap heleheg turuk lit weregma hun Nuh ino kou fam kibag.
Hun Nuh kou fam kibahon ino fahet inindiyen wenggel ha fug angge weregman ik humon yenggeltil laharuk lit it arimano waroho lin ibag. Ap kinangmon atfahon ino waruhu sambil ari hag toho welamuhup.
Ari tuhu sambil ino ap piren yabukmu weregman misig hilaruk lit misig umbusuhu.
Hiyap piren misigmu roti anggen lilibug turuk lamuhup angge famen misig hilaruk lit misig umbusuhu.
Ninikni waruhu sambil ke sambil waruhu ulug henepeleg angge re hinindi honoluk toho kahaleg lamuhup.
O ngi ahun misig ibam wereg lit yoholiyangge waruk ahun hubanggo warik ohoreg ulug oluk toho welaruhu halug nibam halog tuk nowen kema lamin fug ulug kahaleg lit welaruhu.
At ap kinangmon atfahon ino waruhu sambil hit henepeleg tegma waruhu rohon hit hinindi anggat toho welamuhup."

"Ap suwon amingmingangge asukun fano reg lit indi anggat toho wenggel harukon ino fam ikniyen te, 'Notsi winon fer enesug lit suburu og isaruk laruhun,' ulug ikniyen unduhuk ferukon ino sa fam wirim timin?
Ikni waruhu sambil ino amingmingangge ikniyen hiyag itisi ane fano turukmu waruhureg, 'Namloho, hahiyeg toho welamin,' uhu.
Ikni waruhureg amingmingangge ino fam anden angge obog toho hat foroho laruhun ulug hiyag uruhu. Ari tem toho hiyag hisaruk lahi.
Amingmingangge ino fano ane tuk fug angge
nikni folo waruhu fug peruk lit umalikisi winon unusuruk lit ik olokon nalug turuk inap men ambiyeg suburu nenggeg ik nenggeg turuk lit weregma
ikni waruhuwon ino watmisi fug puhureg apeleg toho weregma waruhu.
At waruhureg hat siyag uruk lit ebe waroho ap inindi wenggel haruk eleg inap ambeg hik isahumu uba yatuk lit ayeg kilit matuk lit welaruhu," ulug Yesusen hiyag isibag.

Yesusen wene eke indit toho hiyag isaruk lit, "Allah ap obog toho Inikni arik waruhuwon fahet hiyap numen fam wirim toho hiyag hisamin. Hiyap numen itano nenehe onggoma wam esetug waharukmu olohotma lul ulug iniral hindali ahaluwe walug laruk latusa.
Fuwaben itano enepeleg toho weregma fuwaben onoluk toho welatusa.
Enepeleg toho welatuson itano hindali ahaluwe tor angge kubag fam pilaboho warusa.
Onoluk toho welatuson itanowen hindali ahaluwe su roho kubag fam kilaboho warusa.
Keman yet teg lit weregman ap ino folo waharuk latisi fugmu noho inilen it obog toho nohoruk latusa.
Nohorukmen hup humanoho atisimu ap eneleyen elel eneptuk lit, 'Hun ino waharuken ketiya olohotma lalihiben in amek' uruk latusa.
Uruk latusama hiyap itano in atusareg enehindali ahaluwe kubag fam waruson arimano wal taneg hundutuk latusa.
Hundutuk lit hiyap enepeleg toho welatuson itanowen onoluk toho welatuson itano fam, 'Niniral war aruhu rohon hindali ahaluwe hiren wehebon tot og nesemek,' ulug heng urusa.
Heng urusama onoluk toho welatuson itanowen, 'A, og husulmu hiret niret hindali ahaluwe eleg arik ohoreg. Hit faher oho ayeg waroho hilag lalihip,' urusa.
Ari urusama wak larukmu hun ino waharisimu hiyap hindali ahaluwe ininggikmu werehon itano men ambiyeg mangno atusareg wam esetuk ambeg ino sok laroho kurusa.
Sok laroho kurusareg weregma hiyap winon itano waharusareg, 'Ninikni, sok hut nenebin, nir oho kik wamuk ohon,' uruk latusa.
Uruk latusama ap inowen, 'A, hit tem toho napeleg, hisarikik fug,' irisi," ulug Yesusen indit toho hiyag isibag.
Indit toho hiyag isibareg, "Allah waruhu sul men waruhu sali men henepelehen hinindimu honoluk toho yet teg lit welamuhup," ulug pikit toho hiyag isibag.
"Allah ap obog toho Inikni aruhuwon ino ap eke nibam embeselug yatma lamin perisiyon fam wirim timin. Ap inowen amingmingangge wol eneptisireg anden angge aruma foroho lamuhup ulug hiyag isarisi.

Hiyag isaruk lit namingmingangge misig tu fano roho foroho lam teg perisireg uang inggila fuwaben og itisi. Og itisireg namloho eke tu tot fano roho foroho lam teg perisireg uang inggila piren og itisi. Og itisireg namloho hinahanehon aru re fano roho foroho lam fug teg ulug uang inggila misig og itisi. Og isalug yatma larisi.
Yatma larisimu amingmingangge fuwaben og itisiyon inowen uang ino ap og isaruk lit ayeg wat heheg waruk lit weregman sebe roho numen atisi.
Numen atisimu amingmingangge eke uang inggila piren og itisiyon inowen oho piren og itisi angge famen hinahanehon men uhanehon men sebe roho warisi.
Warisimu amingmingangge hinahanehon misig og itisiyon inowen uang inggila misig ikniyen og itisiyon ino kinang habuloho sale feserisireg welatisi.
Sale feserisimu anunu roho welatusama ap itano inikni ibam waharisireg, 'Anden angge winag hulen maniyek,' ulug amingmingangge wol eneptisi.

Wol eneptisimu waharusareg uang fuwaben og itisiyon ino waharisireg uang numen itano og itisireg, 'Nikni, fuwaben og nitikin angge famen nin fuwaben ayeg waroho warikikteg mangno roho numen foroho lahi,' ulug ikni og itisimu

ikni inowen, 'Namloho, hasukun fano reg lit anden angge fano foroho latikin. Tor angge famen fano roho foroho latikinmu anggolo roho oho foroho laruhunen hiyag huruhuk. Nibam aruma kulug hahiyeg toho welamin,' irisi.
Ari irisimu uang piren og itisiyon ino waharisireg, 'Nikni, piren og nitikin angge famen ayeg waroho piren sebe roho warikikteg mangno roho uhan foroho lahi,' ulug og itisi.

Og itisimu ikniyen, 'Namloho, hasukun fano reg lit tor angge famen fano roho foroho latikinmu anggolo roho oho foroho laruhunen hiyag huruhuk. Nibam aruma kulug hahiyeg toho welamin,' ulug hiyag itisi.
Ari ulug hiyag itisimu misig og itisiyon ino waharisireg, 'Nikni, hat holok hahun angge re yatikin fuhon yahal taruk lahen, emberikin fuhon hilaruk lahen ane ari an noluk.
An hat nakolen te uang misig og nitikinon ino kinang habuloho sale ferikikteg welatikik. Haren angge tu wereg, hilamihin,' irisi.
Irisimu ikni inowen, 'Hasukun siyag hahun hat siyag. Yatikik fuhon yahal taruk lahi ane fahet, emberikik fuhon hilaruk lahi ane fahet holuk teg lahen angge re
uang anden tohon og hitikikon ap winon og eselen. Ap og eselenma walereg anden og hitikikoner angge ayeg waroho welenoner angge wele angge famen eleg,' irisi.
Ari irisireg amingmingangge winon fam, ' Uang misig ino taluk tilihipteg numen forohowon ino og emek,' irisi.
'At mun angge man angge forohowon ino sebe roho og uruhu. At anggengge elehon ino we tot werehon ino taluk tahu,' irisi.
'Namloho siyahon aru hik tegma eneyeg kilit matuk lit uba yatuk ambeg hik esemek,' irisi," ulug Yesusen hiyag isibag.
Yesusen eke hiyag isaruk lit, "At ap kinangmon atfahon inowen malaikat obog toho hondog enebuhureg enebe umbagpag toho wamuhupteg lehoma umbagpag turuk ambeg hur aruhu.
Hur aruhumu ap obog toho At alukema palu arik wamuhup. Palu arik wamuhupmu wam foroho ahunen domba hunon men heyon men minggir eneptuk hag toho Aren ap arimano minggir enebuhu.
Minggir enebuhureg heyon Inggik pikit fil umbuhureg hunon Inggik hare fil umbuhu.

Umbuhureg Ap suwon inowen Inggik pikit fil werehon unubam Ele uruk lit, 'Nori, hit An Nikniyen hi heneptisiyon maniyek, pohol kinang wal tibag sambil hit fahet o wit henepfahon ari hit ngi atihiben kik maniyek.
An suburu obok harikikmu hiren og Nitikip, ik obok harikikmu hiren hinang Nitikip. An pohon hag toho waharikikmu hiren o hiyag Nitikip.

An sum eleg angge welatikikmu hiren sum og Nitikip. An uk warukmu hiren pen Niya waharikip. An ninggik hele waroho weregma hiren pen Niyaruk latikip.' Inggik pikit fil werehon unubam ari ulug hiyag isahu.
Hiyag isahumu it ap fanowon arimanowen, 'Nowe, nosambil suburu obok toho weregma Hiyarukukteg og Hutukuk? Nosambil ik obok toho weregma Hiyarukukteg hinang Hutukuk?
Nosambil pohon hag toho waharukmu Hiyarukukteg o hiyag Hutukuk? Nosambil sum eleg angge weregma Hiyarukukteg sum og Hutukuk?
Nosambil ouk warukmu Hinggik hele waroho weregma yet Hiyarukukteg pen Hiyaruk latukuk?' ari ulug kapal hahup.
Kapal hahupmu Ap suwon inowen te, 'An not siyahon misig tuma werehon fam fano ane turuk latikip ane ari An nubam turuk latikip. Ari we tem toho hiyag hisihi,' ulug hiyag isahu.

Ari ulug hiyag isahureg Inggik hare fil werehon unubam te, 'Hit siyag ane turuk latikibon te An wereg ambeg tuma fug, aliyek. Iblis otsi men yal enebul ulug indok humon war atuk elehon munggaltusa ambeg aliyek.
An suburu obok harikikmu hiren og Nitikip fug. Ik obok harikikmu hiren hinang Nitikip fug.

An pohon hag toho waharikikmu o hiyag Nitikip fug. Sum eleg angge welatikikmu sum og Nitikip fug. An ouk warukmu Ninggik hele waroho weregma pen Niyarikip fug,' ulug Inggik hare fil werehon unubam ari ulug hiyag isahu.

Hiyag isahumu iren oho At ubam enele uruk lit, 'Nowe, nosambil suburu men ik men obok harikinmu og Hutukuk fug? Nosambil Hat pohon hag toho waharukmu, sum eleg angge weregma Hiyarukukteg let Haptukuk fug? Nosambil ouk warukmu Hinggik hele waroho weregma yet Hiyarukukteg pen Hiya larukuk fug?' ulug kapal hahup.
Ari ulug kapal hahupmu Aren te, 'An not siyahon misig tuma werehon fam fano ane tuk fug angge embeserikibon An numbaharuk latikip. Ari we tem toho hiyag hisihi,' ulug hiyag isahu.
It ari turuk latuson arimano mondabi siyagma kuhup, it fanowon arimano Allah men mondabi onoluk welamuhup," ulug Yesusen otsi hiyag isibag.
Yesusen wene arimano hiyag isibareg Otsi fam Ele uruk lit,
"Suburu roti sig elehon nahup sambil Paskah ino o ha welamuhukon ari hit honoluk. At ap atik ibahon ino e fam teloho ware fesuhuben ap ininggikmu aruhu," ulug hiyag isibag.
O ino sambil imam usa inap onowesi men Yahudi inap onowesi men imam onowe suwon unuk Kayafas ino ibam palu ribag.
Palu ribareg nungge fam Yesus ino alem Ubam embelug senebuhukteg ware fesuhuk ulug enele sahaltuk lit,
" Roti sig elehon nahuk sambil ino fug, ino sul ap anggolo wereg angge re enele anggolo uk nowen," uruk latfag.
Yesus ino o Betania Simon yowilangge reg latfag ahun ino ibam kibareg weregma
hiyap misig ahaluwe amben mondabi fanowon kubag fam hinanggoho walug kibag. Walug kibareg Yesus suburu naruk lit heriyegma ik ahaluwe ino Yesus unggulmu hilili fibag.
Hilili ferukmu Yesus otsiyen yet hibareg, "Nungge fahet ik ahaluwe amben fanowon ari saplangge hililtuk?
Ahaluwe amben fanowon ari fam uang teng-teng angge ayeg waroho walug ap enengge elehon og isawon famen turuk," uruk latfag.
Iren uruk latfag ane ari Yesusen oluk atfareg Yesusen, "Hiyap tuwen tehek ane Nubam fano ane tehek angge famen nungge fahet hiren at indi angginap turuk lahep?
Ap enengge eleg inap likiya hupmu hit men welamuhup angge famen An hit men likiya hupmu Noluk welamuhuk fug.
Ahaluwe amben fanowon Nebene hilil Nabehekon ariyen Nebe warehon owikmu kilap Nabuk ohoma Nubam tuhu ane roho tehek.
Mun ibam man ibam Allah wene hiyag isaruk lit at tuwen tehek ane fahet hiyag isaruk lamuhup. Hiyag isarukmu aren tehek ane aru fahet wenggel haruk lamuhup. Ari tem toho hiyag hisaruk lahi," ibag.
Yesus otsi nisanggowen itano misig unuk Yudas Iskariot ino imam usa inap onowesi enembeg libag.

Libareg hiyag isaruk lit, "Ketiya At ino senetihip ulug huruwe henembeg waruhukmu hiren an onggo nungge og numuhup," ulug kapal isibagma iren uang inggila teng misig nubam hilag hinahan (tiga puluh) og itfag.
Og itfagma Yesus hirahoma lahumu huruwe lahuk ulug indimu wenggel haruk latfag.
Suburu roti sig elehon naruk ane ak tibag sul Yesus otsiyen At ubam enele uruk lit, "Nonowe, wam domba Paskah o keman eserik lalusama nul peruk lahen?" ulug kapal hibag.
Kapal hibagma Yesusen, "O pumbukmu lalihipteg ap misig welatnisiyon fam, 'Nonoweyen te An nubam am teg ane horog atuken hat hibamen An notsi men wam esetihipmu nul ehek,' ilihip," ibag.
Ari ibagma Otsi itano libareg Onoweyen ibag ane roho wam domba Paskah ino osoko tug turuk latfag.
Hup atfagma Yesus otsi nisanggowen itano men o ino kibareg heriyeg lit esetfag angge arimano naruk latfag.
Suburu naruk lit itano Aren te, "Hit aruma welahebon misihen An nuwabukag ulug huruwe lamin peruk lit wereg. Ari tem toho uruk lahi," ibag.
Ari ibagma Otsi inindi su atfareg it enele uruk lit, "Nowe, an fahet ehen ano," ulug it enebe wal tanehen Yesus kapal haruk latfag.
Kapal haruk latfagma Yesusen, "Kubag misig fam nininggik ambiyeg kila felug naruk laheyon misihen fahet ihi, aren An fahet huruwe lahu," ibag.
"At ap kinangmon atfahon ino fahet atam haharoho imbibahon hikit toho At war aruhu. War aruhu angge famen ap huruwe lahu ahun ino eneg indi anggin amag, at ino isingan endetep fugmu fano," ibag.
Ari ibagma huruwe lamin pibag ahun Yudas inowen, "Nowe, an fahet ehen ano," ibagma Yesusen, "Hinggarehen ehen," ibag.
Yesusen ari ibareg it suburu narukmu suburu roti wibareg seneg lit sembahyang ibareg kut-kut Otsi og isaruk lit, "Wemek, amiyek, An nebe tu og hisaruk lahi," ibag.
Ari ibareg ik anggur ahaluwe kubag fam hinanggoho werehon lisoho wibareg sembahyang ibareg it og isaruk lit, "Kubag aru fam werehon hit obog toho nalihip.
An namep aru ap anggolowen siyag ane turukon eleg amag ulug wilip aruhu. Wilip aruhumu Allahn fanowap henebuhuk ibag ane tem toho ibag peruk lamuhup," ibag.
"Yoho famen hit men An men ahaluwe aru ambiyeg nahuk fug. We Allah weregma wereg lit eneg hit men ahaluwe keron nahuk, ari ihiyon tem toho hiyag hisihi," ibag.
Allah sini yunggulfareg Yesus otsi men Zaitun punumu lahibag.

Kema laruk lit Yesusen, "Yoho hup An fahet hit obog tohowen hinindi nonghong ik ohoreg. Allahn ele uruk lit, 'Wam domba inikni ino ware fesuhukmu ambohom arimano linggik-longgo uhup,' ulug haharoho imbibahon hikit toho tilihip.
Ari tuhup angge famen Noluk aruhukteg hit uwanma An tam o Galilea lahukteg welaruhuk," ibag.
Ari ibagma Petrus inowen, "It obog toho aruma Hat fahet inindi nonghong imisi angge famen anden eneg nindi nonghong imisi fug," ibag.
Ari ibagma Yesusen, "Yoho hubanggo suwe ayam ele uk fugmu haren An nubahet hinahanam hun ari an tem toho napeleg ulug awiya wamihin," ibag.
Ari ibagma Petrusen te, "Haret andet pinggi nunusul ulug turukmu anden Hat fahet hun ari napeleg ulug awiya wele fug," ibagma ori winonen oho ambi ane ibag.
Enele ari il-il Yesus otsi men silimu misig unuk Getsemani libag. Libareg Otsi unubam Ele hiyag isaruk lit, "An sembahyang lindima ik laminen hit tiya heriyeg lamok," ibag.
Ari ibareg Petrus men Zebedeus umalikisi piren men ambiyeg lul ulug hondog eneplug libag. Libareg Yesus indi anggin hibareg Akol peruk lit
Otsi fam te, "War arik oho lit hag toho Nindi anggin haruk lahireg hit tuma wereg lit hinil wirik toho welamek," ibag.

Ari ibareg horog tot libareg kinangma hur atfareg sembahyang uruk lit, "Nikni Allah, ik kubag aben og numuson ari namin fuhen Haren helelenma fano pihi angge famen Anden perukon famen fug, we Haren perukon famen timihin," ibag.
Ari ibareg Otsi wereg ambeg ari suhuloho waharukmen it nohoruk latfag. Nohoruk latfagma Petrus fam te, "We tor oho An men hinil wirik toho welahep ha fug teg?
Siyahonen hinindi ninap heneptuken hinil wirik toho wereg lit sembahyang uruk lamek. Hinindimu tehe ha reg peruk lahep angge famen hininggiken tuk fug teg lahep," ibag.
Ari ibareg pireneg angge sembahyang imin ulug libareg, "Nikni, ik kubag aben og numuson Haren hilag wam fug teg lahen halug naminmu Haren peruk lahen ane teko lamisi," ibag.
Ari ibareg suhuloho Otsi enembeg waharukmu Otsi noho inilen nohorukmu isa watfag.
Isa watfareg nin hinahaneg angge sembahyang ik libareg ambi ane ino ik libag.
Ari ik libareg Otsi enembeg watfareg it unubam hiyag isaruk lit, "Hit nohoruk lit kel taruk lahep. Ketiya At ap kinangmon atfahon ino ap siyag ane turuk inap ininggikmu atmisiyen yet hemek.
Huruwe lahayon ino horogma tuma waharuken luk ohon in amek," ibag.

Yesusen otsi unubam Ele irikim itano Otsi nisanggowen itano misig unuk Yudas inowen ap karohet firet seneg inap anggolo il oko hondog eneplug waharuk latfag. It waharuk latfahon arimano imam usa ane onoluk inap onowesi men Yahudi inap iniknisi menen mon enepfagma hondog eneplug waharuk latfag.
Huruwe libag ahun inowen ap arimano fam tam hiyag isaruk lit, "Anden mako pug toho hi riminon ino hiren senetihip," ulug tam hiyag isibag.
Waharuk lit itano Yesus iraham libareg Nowe uruk lit mako pug toho hi ruruk latfag.
Hi rurukmu Yesusen te, "Ap o nare, nungge ane timin ulug wahen," ibag. Ari urukmu itano ap arimano watfareg Yesus ki ribag.
Yesus ki rurukmu itano ap Yesus men welatfahon itano misihen karog lisoho wibareg imam onowe suwon amingmingangge misig karog fam kong turuk lahi ulug turukmen isanggo eneg sanog tibisibag.
Isanggo sanog tibisibagma Yesusen te, "Karog ari ei elma kilabe fisin," ibareg, "Ap san karog senetuk halug at ino karog fam siyag aruhu," ibag.
"An nikni fam heng telema malaikat asan nisanggowen An let Nabukag ulug Nikniyen mon eneplebon hat hapeleg?
Malaikaren let Naplepma ari roho tuhup ulug atam haharoho imbibag ane nangginoho hikir alep?" ibag.

Ari ibareg ap anggolo arimano fam, "Hiren ap unusuruk ahun pehepteg karohet firet walug wahepteg sen Nabul ulug wahep? Likiya hupmu Allah ibam heriyeg lit hiyag isaruk latikik angge famen sen Naptikip fug.
Hiren turuk lahebon aru atam wene hiyag isaruk latfag inaben haharoho imbibahon hikir amag ulug turuk lahep," ibag. Ari urukmu itano Otsi arimano obog toho At embeselug linggik-longgo ibag.
Yesus senetfareg hondoholug imam onowe suwon Kayafas ambeg Musa wene onoluk inap men Yahudi inap iniknisi men palu roho weregma walug libag.
Walug larukmu Petrus ino onombolim mug eneplug imam onowe suwon ibam horogma libareg owahalma libareg nungge ane ulusa ulug imam enemingmingangge arimano men ambiyeg heriyeg latfag.
Imam onowesi men palu roho welatfag inap arimano obog toho menen pinggi ware fusukag ulug un ane Ubam lombohap turuk latfag.
Ap anggolowen enele si un ane Ubam lombohap tibag angge famen alem suwon Ubam umbukon eleg latfag.
Eleg latfagma ap piren in atfareg hiyag isaruk lit, "Allah ibam halog tebesuhukteg nin hup hinahanam wiruhuk ulug hun tuwen irisi," ibag.
Ari ulug hiyag isibagma imam onowe suwon in atfareg Yesus fam, "Ap aruman Hat hubam lombohap Haptuk ane fahet Haren hebeloho hiyag isa fug teg lahen?" ibag.

Ari ibagma Yesus ele eleg angge welatfag. Welatfagma imam onowe suwon inowen Ubam ele uruk lit, "Mesias Allah amloho welahen halug hiyag nisimin. Ari Allah oluk werehon Unuk uruk lit heng Haptuk lahi," ibag.

Ari ibagma Yesusen, "Haren ehen ari. Yoho famen At ap kinangmon atfahon ino Allah suwon Inggik pikit fil heriyegma hina poholmon fene wambik waruhumu yet hahup. Aru tem toho hiyag hisaruk lahi," ibag.
Ari ibagma imam onowe suwon ino indi oloken inggareg asum tararag taruk lit, "Hun tuwen Allah abug urukmu hit obog tohowen holehep anggeyen nungge fahet alem winon yami ruruk lit ap winon kapal usul?
Hiren nungge peruk lahep?" ibagma it arimanowen, "At pinggi ware feselihip," ibag.
Ari ibareg Olohotma wasubag sup isaruk lit ininggik holum watuk lit Oroholiyanggenma ware feseruk latfag. Winonen At watuk lit,
"Hat Mesias angge re ap san Huwarehek, hiyag nisimin," ulug umungguruk latfag.

Iren ari tirikim Petrus owahalma silimu heriyeg lit welatfag. Heriyeg lit weregman ap suwon amingmingangge hiyap angge misig watfareg, "Har oho Yesus Galilea ahun ino men likiya hupmu ambiyeg welatikip," ibag.
Ari ibagma Petrusen, "Hat hindimu wenggel hehenteg ehenon ari an napeleg," ulug ap obog toho iniline awiya wibag.
Awiya wibareg elehet sok horogma libareg weregman amingmingangge winon misihen yet hibareg ap welatfahon arimano hiyag isaruk lit, "Hun tu Yesus Nazaret ahun ino men ambiyeg welatisi ahun," ibag.
Ibagma Petrusen ele ine roho, "Tik-tem toho ap ino an napeleg," ulug awiya wibag.
Tot welatfareg ap welatfahon arimano Petrus ambeg watfareg enele uruk lit, "Hele famen eneg tehen har oho it men welatikinon," ibag.
Ari ibagma Petrus inowen lukuram sipuk tibareg awiya waruk lit, "Hiren hun ari fahet uruk lahebon an we tik tem toho napeleg," ibag. Ari uruk li itano suwe ayam ele ibag.

Suwe ayam ele ibagma Yesusen te, "Suwe ayam ele uwan uk fugmu haren hinahanam An fahet awiya wamihin," ulug hiyag itfag ane ino Petrus undama oluk atfagma indimu siyag atfagma selma wilip atfareg uba yatuk latfag.
O sakan tirikim itano imam onowesi men Yahudi inap iniknisi menen Yesus pinggi ware fusukag ulug kong tibag.
Kong tibareg Inggik hele pug tibareg hun Pilatus kinang seneg ahun ambeg hondoholug libareg og itfag.

Og itfagma Yudas huruwe libag ahun inowen Yesus pinggi ware fusukag urukon hol hibareg indi anggin atfag. Indi anggin atfareg uang inggila teng misig nubam hilag hinahan (tiga puluh) og itfahon ino uwag oko imam onowesi men Yahudi inap iniknisi men enembeg imbisik libag.

Imbisik laruk lit, "Ap siyag ane turuk elehon famen Amep hinang tawag ulug henembeg huruwe waharikik ari an siyag," ibag. Ari ibagma ap arimanowen, "Niren nungge ane hiyag numusa ulug wahen? Hinggarehen hal tamihin," ibag.
Ari ibagma Yudasen uang ino Allah ibam hik-hak isalug wilip atfareg hele anggolopma ililoho inggarehen wat taruk tibag.
Wat taruk tibagma imam usa ane onoluk inap arimanowen uang hik isibahon ino palu ribareg, " Uang ap mep faheron kubag Allah fahet kilaptukon fam kilabuk fug teg,"
ulug enele sahaltuk latfareg ap pohon war atukmu sal eneptuk ambeg fahet kinang misig unuk Kinang Laltuk Ahun onggo palfag.
Onggo palfag angginang ino ketiya oho aben te unuk Mep Kinang uruk.

Alem tibag ane ari hun Yeremia Allah wene atam hiyag isaruk latfahon inowen haharoho imbibahon hikit toho tibag. Haharoho imbibag ane aru, " Uang inggila teng misig nubam hilag hinahan arimano ap ayeg watukon uang ari roho waruk lamuhup ulug atam kong tibahon hikit toho hilarusa.
Hilarusareg uang ino kinang laltuk ahun fam kinang onggo paltusa. Ari roho tuhup ulug Allahn hiyag nitisi," ulug Yeremia inowen haharoho imbibag.
Yesus ino hun Pilatus kinang seneg ahun ambeg walug libagma hun inowen kapal haruk lit, "Hat Yahudi inap onowe suwon raja welahen ano?" ibagma Yesusen, "We haren ehen," ibag.
Ari ibagma imam onowesi men Yahudi inap iniknisi menen alem Ubam lombog turukmu Yesus ele uk fug angge welatfag.
Welatfagma Pilatus inowen, "Alem angginon Hubam lombohap turuk ane holtuk lahen fug," ibagma
Yesus ele uk fug angge welatfagma Pilatus ino akol hibag.
O Paskah seni suwon esetuk sambil ino mo eke fam mo eke fam ap suwon kinang seneg ahun inowen ap ininggik hele warehon arimano misig-misig tu lol nisimin ulug aben heng turukon lol isaruk latfag.
O ino sambil ap misig unuk Barabas unuk eke Yesus at olok ane turukon fahet ap obog tohowen onoluk ahun hele waroho foroho latfag.
Yahudi inap arimano palu arik libagma hun Pilatusen te kapal isaruk lit, "Sa lol hisamin, Barabas unuk eke Yesus ino ano, Yesus unuk Kristus urukon ino ano?" ulug kapal isibag.
Kapal isibag ane ari Yahudi inap arimanowen Yesus turuk ane fahet enehummu siyahen walug wahasa ulug Pilatus oluk atfareg kapal isibag.

Pilatus ino unggum kong turuk ambeg heriyeg lit weregma uheyen te ap siyag ane turuk eleg ahun ari fahet yoho hup nei og hihi ane fahet nindi anggin ahama haren ap ari fahet alem haluk fug ulug amingmingangge monde fibag.
Imam onowesi men Yahudi inap iniknisi menen ap anggolo arimano unubam milal eneptuk lit, "Yesus pinggi ware fesemihinen Barabas lol nisimin iyok," ulug milal eneptuk latfag.
Milal eneptuk latfagma Pilatus inowen ap anggolo arimano kapal isaruk lit, "Hit hinindimuwen ap piren ariya sa lol nisamisi peruk lahep," ulug kapal isibagma iren te, "Barabas," uruk latfag.
Barabas uruk latfagma hun Pilatus inowen, "Hiren ari ehepma Yesus unuk eke Kristus aru fam nangginmin," il larikim it obog tohowen, "At e fam tele fusukag," ulug enele hum toho uruk latfag.
Ari uruk latfagma, "Hun aruwen siyag ane nungge tirisimu uruk lahep?" ibagma enele ngi hum uruk lit, "E fam tele fusukag," uruk latfag.

Tele fusukag uruk latfagma Pilatus inowen ap anggolowen ngik ngog turukmu yer isibareg anden nungge tuk fug teg lahi ulug ik wak libareg ap arimano onolohotman inggik umatuk lit, "Ap aru amep wambimisi ane an te fug, we hiren famen tilihip," ibag.
Ari ibagma ap anggolo arimanowen, "At amep wambimisiyon ari nit men nunumalikisi men nunubam wambimisi," uruk latfag.
Ari uruk latfagma, "Barabas ino lol isaruk lit Yesus e paleg fam watihipteg e fam teltihip," ulug otsi hiyag isibareg og isibag.
Pilatus kinang seneg ahun otsi sehen seneg inap arimanowen Yesus hondoholug unggum kong turuk ambeg libareg onori winon anggolo luhaloho maniyek ulug wol enepfagma Yesus walingguruk latfag.
Walinggoho wereg lit At asum nonggoloho hik isibareg sum huluwon wan tibisibareg

alog ahele mase roho Unggulmu kolog tibisibareg fili paleg misig Inggik pikiron fam imbibareg Yesus alukema hur atuk lit, "Yahudi inap onowe suwon ninikni hi haptuk lahe," ulug Inggaliyap turuk latfag.
Inggaliyap turuk lit wasubag Ebene sup isibareg fili ino lisoho Unggul arap toho watuk latfag.
Ari turuk lit Inggaliyap tibareg sum huluwon ino nonggole fibareg Inggareg asum ino wan tibil laruk lit e fam teltul ulug hondoholug wilip atfag.
O inowen wilip atfareg larukmen ap misig unuk Simon Kirene ahun men salkal ibareg at ino inggik lisoho teltuk ahen aru ha rin ulug hiyag itfag.
Hiyag itfareg laruk lit sili misig unuk Golgota nit nenele roho "Ap unggul uwag silimu" ino libag.
Libareg ik namisi ulug hele anggur ahaluwe men sig turuk angge men mangno roho og Itfagma tot nek harukmen sig turuken namin fug ulug imbisibag.
E fam tele fisibareg Asum arimano wal taneg hulul ulug enehangge hik tibag.
Enehangge hik tibareg welatfareg heriyeg lit At foroho latfag.
Yahudi inap onowe suwon welahi uruk latisiyon fahet tele fesehe ulug At unggul palimu Yesus Yahudi inap onowe suwon tu ulug haharoho lombog tibibag.
Yesus tele fisibareg ap hirako unusuruk latfag inap piren oho misihon Inggik pikit fil misihon Inggik hare fil tele fisibag.

La wam turuk latfag inap arimanowen, "Haren Allah ibam halog tuhukteg o hinahanam wuruhuk irikin angge re Hat Allah amloho welahen halug Hinggarehen holukap tamihinteg e tel Habeheson ari famen wambik ma," ulug unum hilik uruk lit At inggaliyap turuk latfag.
Inggaliyap turukmu imam onowesi men Musa wene onoluk inap men Yahudi inap iniknisi arimanowen oho Inggaliyap turuk lit,
