Ap Farisi inap welatfahon itanowen Yesus fam kapal haruk lit, "Allah waruhuwon nosambil waruhu," ibagma Yesus hebeloho, "Allah waruhu ehebon ino enehangge turukmu yet haruk lahep hag toho waruhu fug.
Aben te, 'Yet hemek, Allah tuma wereg, lumu wereg,' uruk lam fug teg. Allah ap obog toho Inikni aruhuwon ino hit sehelimu wereg ulug ari tem toho hiyag hisaruk lahi," ibag.
Ari ibareg Otsi unubam uruk lit, "Hit fobik welamuhupteg hup misihim At ap kinangmon atik ibahon kim hilareg welala puhup angge famen hahup fug.
Aben hit hunubam enele uruk lit, 'Yet hemek At umu wereg, tuma wereg,' uruk lamuhupmu holuhupteg yami ruk fug angge enele holoho umbusuhup.
Lebeglu pohol alem filen atog fil lebeg turuk hag toho At ap kinangmon atik ibahon ino waruhu sambil ari inam aruhumu hiren yet hahup.
Ari roho uwan inam am fugmu miyaloho hik isahupteg Ebe wabuhup.
Ap kinangmon atik ibahon ino waruhu sambil ari indam Nuh umalikisi unubam atfahon ino hikit toho aruhu.

It indam welatfahon arimano suburu nenggeg ik nenggeg turuk lit aben hiyap heleheg hiyaben ap heleheg turuk lit welatfagma Nuh kou fam kibag sambil ino ik humon yenggeltil laharuk lit it arimano waroho lin ibag.
Lot umalikisi welatfahonen oho ari hag toho turuk latfag. Iren oho suburu nenggeg ik nenggeg og eseheg onggo paloho heleheg yabuk wireheg o wireheg turuk lit welatfagma
hun Lot ino Sodom embeselug libag sambil ino indok men helebanggen men poholman o pumbuk ino fam pilabik watfagma it arimano obog toho waroho lin ibag.
Ap kinangmon atik ibahon ino inam aruhu sambil ino ap arimano ari hag toho welamuhup.
O ari tuhu sambil ino silimu o palimu heriyeg lit welaruhuwon at anggengge mun angge man angge olma werehon hilamin ulug kuhu fug. Yabukmu werehon ino nibam suhuloho lamin puhu fug.
Lot uhe inowen tibag ane wenggel homok!
An noluk welaruhuk peruk lit wereg ahun ino oluk welaruhu fug. Longgo uhuk peruk lit wereg ahun ino Allah olohotma mondabi oluk welaruhu.
Allah waruhu sambil ino hubanggo ap piren misigmu nohoruk lamuhup angge famen misig hilahureg eke umbusuhu ulug tem toho komo heneptuk lahi," ibag.
"Hiyap piren misigmu roti anggen lilibug turuk lamuhup angge famen misig hilahureg eke umbusuhu.
Ap piren yabuk wituk lamuhup angge famen misig hilahureg eke umbusuhu," ulug hiyag isibag.
Hiyag isibagma Otsiyen Yesus fam kapal haruk lit, "Keman tuhu ane fahet ehen?" ibagma Yesusen, "Sobon men pamo men enele ngu ruruk halug ari amben angge ita wereg peruk lahep," ulug hiyag isibag.
Yesusen otsi indit toho hiyag isaruk lit, "Sembahyang uruk lit saplangge uruk lahe peruk lam fug," ulug hiyag isibag.
Hiyag isaruk lit, "O pumbuk eke ap suwon unggum kong turuk latisi ahun misig wereg lit Allah fahet akol ha fug angge ap winon fahet oho akol toho welatisi fug.
O pumbuk ino fam hiyap yuwohon misig ap eke min seli roho welatisiyon inowen alem kong turuk ahun ino ambeg likiya hupmu waharuk lit, 'Alem anden tohon ino kong nitmihin,' ulug ik waharuk latisi.

Ubam ari ik waharuk latisi angge famen ap inowen hiyap ino ele holoho embeseruk latisireg fobik indimu wenggel haruk lit, 'An Allah fahet nakol toho welahi fug angge, ap winon faher oho nakol toho welahi fug angge famen
hiyap ari nele yong naptuk lit an nubam yik kilabik waruhu rohon unggum aren tohon kong itmin,' perisi," ulug Yesusen hiyag isibag.
Hiyag isibareg, "Unggum kong turuk ahun indi hareyon inowen perisi ane ari hir oho wenggel haruk lamok.
Ap Allahn mumal eneptisiyon arimanowen Ubam enele likiya hupmu urukon iren tohon unggum kong isa fug anggeyen sono ha ulug hikip tebeselug enele holoho umbusuk teg?

Allah umalikisi unubam alem wereg halug folo-folo kong isaruk laruhu ulug tem toho hiyag hisaruk lahi. Ap kinangmon atik ibahon ino waharuk lit Allah fam tem peruk inap weregma ano elegma ano waruhu?" ulug Yesusen kapal isibag.
Ap winonen nit fano ulug ininggareg wel taruk latfag inaben ap winon fahet hit siyag ulug apmayap eneptuk latfagma Yesusen wene misig indit toho hiyag isibag.
"Ap piren sembahyang ul ulug sembahyang uruk ibam laruson misig Farisi ahun, misig pemerintah amingmingangge ap fam uang embelug lalihip uruk ahun welatisiyon ino men larusa.

Larusareg Farisi ahun ino pulmu unduhuk lit undaman sembahyang uruk lit, 'Allah Nikni, ap winon hag toho welahi fug. Ap unusuruk lit enenggengge hilaruk lahi fug. Ap unubam siyag ane turuk lahi fug. Ap unuhesi hilaruk lahi fug. Pemerintah amingmingangge siyag ane turuk ahun tu hag toho welahi fug.
Minggu misig fam Hat hubam sembahyang imin ulug hiyang ninggik pirenam welahi. Anden angge palu numen tebelug numon ino Hat hunuk fam emberuk lahi,' irisi.
Ari urukmu pemerintah amingmingangge ino ilanma unduhuk lit nil poholma lahap hamin fug peruk lit kunuk toho wereg lit, 'Allah Nikni, an siyag ane turuk nahun Hindi niyimin,' irisi."

Hindi niyimin irisi ulug hiyag isibareg Yesusen te, "Ap aru Allahn fanowap tirisimu ibam larisi. Farisi ahun ino fanowap tirisi fug. Inggareg palimuwap tarukon Allahn apmayap tuhu, inggareg apmayap tarukon Allahn palimuwap tuhu," ulug pikit toho hiyag isibag.

Yesusen wene hiyag isarukmen aben unumalikisi toron Yesusen hi enepmisi ulug hondog eneplug waharuk latfag. Waharukmu Yesus otsiyen yer isibareg malik toron nungge fahet hondog eneplug waharuk ulug per enepfag.

Per eneptukmen Yesusen, "Malik toron arimano An nambeg wamag tohon hiren per enebuk fug," ulug malik toron wol eneptuk lit, "Allah ap obog toho Inikni aruhuwon malik aruma hag toho werehon eneg Inikni aruhu," ibag.
"Malik toronen, 'Allah ap obog toho Inikni aruhuwon Ar oho nit Ninikni nir oho At umaliki,' urukon hag toho uruk elehon Allah weregma kuk fug teg, ari tem toho hiyag hisaruk lahi," ibag.

Yahudi inap onowe roho werehon misihen Yesus fam kapal haruk lit, "Nowe, Hat fano ane hiyag isaruk Hahun, an Allah ambeg kuhukteg mondabi noluk welaruhuken nanggin-nanggin turuk laruhuk, hiyag nimin," ibag.
Ibagma Yesusen hebeloho, "Nare, An nubam nungge fahet Hat fano Hahun ehen? We Allah misig eneg fanowon wereg," ibareg,
"Allah wene atam ibahon ari hat holuk: Hiyap pal ta fug, ap unusuk fug, yoholiyangge hila fug, ap enebug henele si uk fug, hiniknisi hinisingasi hinindi roho welamuhup ibahon ari hat holuk," ibag.
Ibagma ap inowen hebeloho, "Ehenon ari nebe kabinimu holtuk latikikon ketiya Haren ehenon oho holihi," ibag.

Ibag ane ari Yesusen hol hibareg Yesusen, "We misig eneg holuk atuk eleg: Haren angge obog toho ayeg waruhunteg ap enenggengge elehon ayeg waruhun angge arimano og isa lahunmu hat ngi aruhun angge poholma welaruhu. Poholma werehen suhuloho Nambeg waruhunmu An men ambiyeg laruk lamuhuk," ibag.
Yesusen ibag ane ap inowen hol hibareg aren angge anggolo werehen indi anggin atfag.
Indi anggin atfareg weregma Yesusen yet hibareg ap winon hiyag isaruk lit, "Ap ininggikmu uang anggolo werehon Allah ambeg kuk teg angge famen anggengge anggolo werehen kuk fug teg.
Wam sapi lisu fo reg keyen kuk hag teg halug ap enengge anggolo werehon eke Allah ambeg kuk teg," ibag.
Ibag ane ari ap arimanowen hol hibareg, "Haren ari ehenma ap sa Allah ambeg kuk teg?" ulug Yesus kapal hibagma
Yesusen, "Ap kinangmonen tuk fug tohon ari Allahn eneg tuk hag teg lit wereg," ibag.
Ari ibagma Petrusen, "Nowe, niren angge mun angge man angge embeserukukteg Hat men ambiyeg laruk lahe," ibagma
Yesusen, "Allah wene fahet ibam embeselug uhe owesi otsi embeselug ikni isinga umaliki embeselug laruk inap arimano
ketiya kinangma welahe li Allahn onggo sebe roho og isahureg fobik welamuhupmu Allah men mondabi onoluk welamuhup," ibag.

Yesusen otsi nisanggowen Niraham tiya maniyek ulug wol enepfareg Ele hiyag isaruk lit, "Nori, nit Yerusalem ilig amuhukmu wene atam hiyag isaruk latfag inap arimanowen At ap kinangmon atfahon fahet haharoho imbibahon hikit aruhu.
At ino Allah wene enepeleg inap og isahupmu Inggaliyap turuk lit Ebe watuk lit wasubag sup isaruk lit
siyahap turuk lit pinggi ware fesuhup. Ware fesuhup angge famen hup hinahaneg angge Allahn Olukap tuhu," ulug hiyag isibag.
Hiyag isibahon fahet inindi sohu reg lit nungge fahet hiyag nesehek ulug inindi anggar atfag fug.
Yesus o Yerikho lamin ulug horogma larukmen ap il hupnihon funggalma heriyeg lit ap la wam turukon fam hengangge heng eneptuk latfag.
Heng eneptuk lit weregma ap anggolo laruk lit enele urukon hol isibareg ap anggolo nungge fahet laruk ulug ap fam umung isibagma
iren te, "Yesus Nazaret ahun ino men laruk," ibag.
Ari ibagma ele hi roho uruk lit, "Yesus Daud amloho, an Hindi niyimin," uruk latfag.
Uruk latfagma ap atam laruk latfahon arimanowen hele imbisin ulug pet tibagma enele holuk fug angge sobir isaruk lit ele hi roho, "Daud amloho, Hindi niyimin," uruk latfag.
Uruk latfagma Yesus in atfareg, "Ap ari Nambeg tiya hondoholug maniyek," ibag. Ibagma ap ino Iraham watfagma Yesusen at ubam kapal haruk lit,
"Nungge ane nubam timisi ulug heng Naptuk lahen?" ibagma, "Nowe, an nil fano atnisiyen heng Haptuk lahi," ibag.
Ibagma Yesusen, "Hil fano amag! Nil fanowap napmisi ulug we tem toho pehenon ariyen fano ahen," ibag.
Yesusen ari irikim il fano atfagma Yesus men ambiyeg laruk lit Allah wel turuk latfag. Wel turukmu ap anggolo arimanowen yet hibareg iren oho Allah wel turuk latfag.
Yesus o Yerusalem lamin ulug o Yerikho keyen laruk latfag.
Larukmen ap eke unuk Zakheus pemerintah amingmingangge ap fam uang embelug lalihip uruk inap onowe aren angge anggolo werehen at tung ahun hag toho welatfag.
Zakheus inowen Yesus yet ha lamin ulug libareg at uwag horog tehen ap anggolo arimanowen mapmu rehen yet ha fug teg latfag.
Yet ha fug tehen folo-folo olohotma arik libareg Yesus ke aru waharukmu yet hamin ulug e ara fene lahibag.
Lahibareg weregma Yesus iraham libareg lahap haruk lit, "Zakheus, hat hibam ketiya lulen folo wambik ma," ibag.
Ari ibagma folo-folo wambibareg ahiyeg haruk lit Yesus hondoholug ibam libag.
Ibam kurukmu aben yet hibareg, "Ap siyag ane eneg turuk ahun ibam nungge fahet kehek," ulug enele siyag toho uruk latfag.

Uruk latfagma Zakheusen Yesus fam ele uruk lit, "Nowe, ap hiyap enenggengge elehon anden angge pul ke minggiroho og isamin," ibareg, "Aben tohon hilarikikon faher oho iren angge fahet sebe roho uhanam ayeg war isamin," ibag.
Ibagma Yesusen, "Ap aru oho Abraham amloho werehen te Allahn o aru yoho fanowap tehek," ibag.
"At ap atik ibahon ino it longgo uruson hiyag enebuhukteg fanowap enebuhuk ulug waharisi," ibag.
Yesusen hiyag isibahon ari holfag inaben Yerusalem horogma welahereg Allah wambik waruhureg nit fanowap nenebuhuwon horog toho welahe peruk latfagma Yesusen wirimangge eke hiyag isamin pibag.
"Ap suwon misig o yatma lamin perisi ambeg ino ap suwon arik lahukteg nin fobik suhuloho nibam waruhuk ulug larisi.
Lik oho lit amingmingangge numen wol enepfareg wal taneg uang suwon og isarisi. Og isaruk lit, ' Uang aru fam onggo paleheg ayeg war eseheg turuk lamuhupmu an waruhuk,' irisi.
An fobik waruhuk ulug larukmen ibam yugmu inap arimanowen at nit nonowe roho welaruhu fuhen ninirim ulug ombolim muko lalihipteg hiyag irik lalihip ulug ap mon eneptusa.

Mon eneptusama at ino larisireg ap suwon atisireg ibam suhuloho waharisireg amingmingangge uang og isarisi inap arimano wol eneptisi. Uang og isarikikon nombaren ayeg waroho warusa perisireg hiyag numusa ulug wol eneptisi.
Wol eneptisimu ap atamon ino waharisireg hiyag utuk lit, 'Nikni, haren og nitikinon ino anden ayeg waroho numen warikik,' irisi.
Irisimu ikni inowen, 'Namloho, haren turuk latikin ane fano hiyag nerehen. Tor angge famen fano roho foroho latikinmu o pumbuk numen fahet inikni ap suwon welaruhun,' irisi.
Ari irisimu ap pirenehon ino waharisireg, 'Nikni, haren og nitikinon fam fuwaben ayeg waroho warikik,' irisi.
Irisimu ikni inowen, 'Hat eke o pumbuk fuwaben inikni roho wereg laruhun,' irisi.

Irisimu amingmingangge hinahanehon ino waharisireg, 'Nikni, hat holok hahun ulug nakolen an og nitikinon ino wilikap fam het toho foroho latikik angge tu hilamihin. Emberikin fuhonet sebe roho hilaruk lahen. Yag tarikin fuhonet sebe roho yahal taruk lahen. Ari roho turuk lahen ane an noluk,' irisi.
Irisimu ikniyen, 'Namloho hat siyag, hinggarehen ehenon ari fam hebeloho pet hapnin. Emberikik fuhonet yag tarikik fuhonet nolok nahunen hilaruk lahi ane hat holuk teg lahen.
Holuk teg angge famen uang og hitikikon nungge fahet ap winon og isarikin fug? Og eselenma iren ayeg waroho og hetlepma sebe roho helele,' irisi.
Irisireg ap welatuson arimano fam, ' Uang ari taluk tilihipteg numen forohowon ino og emek,' irisimu
ap arimanowen, 'Ninikni, aren numen foroho angge re nin eke nungge fahet sebe roho og umul,' ulug kapal harusa," ulug Yesusen hiyag isibag.
Hiyag isaruk lit, "Enengge anggolo forohowon itano Allahn sebe roho og isahu, enengge elehon itano tor angge forohoman taluk toho hilahu," ulug pikit toho hiyag isibag.

Hiyag isibareg ap suwonen tuhu ane hiyag isaruk lit, "An men seli roho welatuson tuman ap suwon arik waruhu fug urusa inap arimano tuma hondog eneplug wamuhupmu an nolohotman waroho lin isahup ulug ap suwonen ari irisi," ulug hiyag isibag.
Wene ari obog toho hiyag isibareg Yesus tam atfagma Otsi men Yerusalem fil laruk latfag.
Yerusalem fil laruk latfareg Yesus o Betfage men Betania men Zaitun punumu wirihon itano horogma libareg otsi piren unubam hit tam laruk lamek ulug mon eneptuk lit,
"O pumbuk lindi lalihipteg keledai umalik ket su atukon ap ubam laharusa fuhon ililoho weregma halihibon ari loltihipteg walug watihip.
Aben nungge fahet loltuk lahep ulug umung hisaruk halug, 'Nonowe asehet tehen mon nenebehekma loltuk lahe,' ilihip," ibag.
Ibagma Yesus otsi piren mon enepfahon itano libareg Onoweyen hiyag isibahon hikit toho weregma libag.
Libareg keledai umalik ino loltukmen ngi inap arimanowen, "Nungge fahet loltuk lahep," ibagma iren te, "Nonowe asehet tehen mon nenebehekma loltuk lahe," ibag.
Ibareg keledai ino Yesus ambeg walug watfareg enesum wan tohon nonggoloho keledai palimu tuwale fibareg Yesus hamboko horiye fik lahibag.
Lahibareg larukmen ap arimanowen enesum nonggoloho Nonowe watmisi ke ulug funggalem ke tuwaltil laruk latfag.

Tuwaltil laruk lit Zaitun punumu wamburuk lit Yesus otsi men ap anggolo laruk latfahon arimanowen enehiyeg atfagma enele humon fam Allah wel turuk lit, "Mun angge man angge aben tuk fug ane nonolohotman tirisiyon yet harukuk.
Ap suwon Allah unuk fam waharukon hi ruruk lahe. Poholman palimu werehon Allahn fanowap tirisimu At wel turuk lamuhup," uruk latfag.
Ari uruk latfagma Farisi inap it sehelimu werehonen Yesus fam enele uruk lit, "Nonowe, Hotsi enele eleg amusan komo enebin," ibagma
Yesusen, "An notsi aruma enele eleg amusa halug helep aruman enele hi roho ulusa. Ari tem toho ihi," ibag.
Ari ibareg Yesus o Yerusalem horogma libareg o pumbuk yet hibareg uba yatuk lit,
"O Yerusalem nindiyen-e, hat fanowap habuhuwon ino yoho holuk toho welalen angge famen ketiya hat holohotma ari hiraho lit wereg.
Tot welaruhunmu ap seliyonen walinggoho kilap habuhupteg huwabuk oho lit kinang amuwon habuloho o Yerusalem elehet yaron ohowon ino horohap tuhupteg kuhup.

Kuhupteg hibam halog tebeseruk lit hunumalikisi unusuruk lit helep elehet ohowon ubule misig oho welaruhu fug. Allahn fanowap hapmin perisi sambil ari haren wenggel harikin fugmu ari roho huwabuhup," ibag.
Yesus o Yerusalem Allah ibam kibareg onggo paloho ayeg waroho waruk inap yanggal eneptuk lit,
"An nibam tu sembahyang uruk ibam haharoho wereg angge famen hiren siyag ane turuk inap inibamap tirikip," ibag.

Ibareg likiya hupmu Allah ibamen wene hiyag isarukmu imam onowesi suwon men Musa wene onoluk inap men Yahudi onowesi suwon men alem nungge fam umbuhukteg wabuhuk ulug enele sahaltuk latfag angge famen ap anggolo wene fanowon holtul ulug luhal arik watfagma senebuk fug teg latfag.
Misihim sambil Yesusen Allah ibamen wene fanowon hiyag isarukmu imam onowesi suwon men Musa wene onoluk inap men Yahudi inap onowesi men Ambeg libareg kapal haruk lit,
"Haren turuk lahenon ari san Hineyap haptisireg Holukap haptisimu turuk lahen, nir oho hiyag nisimin," ibag.
Ibagma Yesusen, "Anden oho hit hunubam hebeloho kapal hisamin.
Yohanesen ap ikma pilap eneptuk latisiyon ari poholman perisi ane ano, ap kinangmonen perusa ane ano ulug hiren An hiyag Nemek," ibag.
Ibagma it-it enele sahaltuk lit, "Poholman perisi ane ul halug nungge fahet at ele holtikip fug ik ohoreg.
Ap kinangmonen perusa ane ul halug ap aruman Yohanes ari Allahn monde ferisiyon tem toho peruk lit helep fam nunusuk ohoreg," uruk latfag.
Uruk latfareg Yesus fam, "Nenepeleg," ibagma
Yesusen, "Hiren nenepeleg ehepma Anden oho An nineyap naptisiyon fahet hiyag hisamin fug," ibag.
Yesusen ap anggolo weregma indit toho hiyag isaruk lit, "Ap misihen hele anggur yabuk wiri feserisireg ap winon foroho lamuhup ulug hiyag isarisireg o yatma larisireg amusun toho welatisi.

Welatisireg anggur anggen urukon li waharuk ulug anggen eke minggiroho numbahakup ulug amingmingangge monde ferisi. Monde ferisimu yabuk foroho inap enembeg larukmen ware feserusareg og humul fug ulug yanggaltusa.
Yanggaltusama nin amingmingangge eke monde ferisimu ino oho ambi roho ebe watuk lit har oho og humul fug ulug yanggaltusa.
Yanggaltusama amingmingangge hinahanehon monde ferisimu ebe ware feserusareg miyaloho hik isarusa.
Hik isarusama ngi ahun inowen nangginoho timin perisireg namloho nindiyon monde feminmu at fahet enekol hahup perisireg monde ferisi.
Monde ferisimu waharukmu yet harusareg, 'Yabuk ngi aruhuwon ino waharuken pinggi ware fusulteg yabuk nit ngi amuhuk,' ulug enele sahaltuk latusa.
Sahaltuk latusareg waroho elehet selma hik isarusareg pinggi ware feserusa. Yabuk ngi ahun ino waharuk lit yabuk foroho inap unubam nangginuhu," ulug Yesusen ele indit toho kapal isibag.
Kapal isibareg, "Ngi ahun waruhureg yabuk foroho inap waroho pinggi unusuhureg yabuk ino ap winon hiyag isahu," ibag. Ari ibagma ap arimanowen hol hibareg, "Ari roho tuk fug teg," ibagma
Yesusen yer isibareg, "Wene atamon fam haharoho imbibahon iminon tu holeg lamok, 'O wituk inaben helep tu siyag ulug hik isaruson ino ubule yag atisi.' Nungge ulug haharoho imbibag?

Ap eke helep ubule ino fam uyug kik turuk lit mako wambuhureg uyug fala roho uwag lilibug toho lin uhu. Helep inowen ap ino hondo ruhu halug ap ino lilibug toho kinang aruhu," ulug Yesusen hiyag isibag.

Hiyag isibagma Musa wene onoluk inap, imam onowesi suwon arimanowen, "Yesusen hiyag nesehekon ari nit fahet ehek," ulug enele sahaltuk lit o ino sambil Yesus ki rul ulug tibag angge famen ap anggolo enekolen imbisibag.

Musa wene onoluk inap men imam onowesi men Yesus uruk ane aluwat halihip ulug ap mon eneptuk lit, "Yesusen siyag ane uruk halug senebuhukteg pemerintah ap suwon wereg ambeg hondoholug lahuken Aren uruk ane aluwat haruk lit Yesus ele holtuk inap hag toho turuk latihip," ibag.
Ibagma libareg Yesus fam kapal haruk lit, "Nonowe, ap winon fahet Nakol puk fug angge Hele uruk lahenon Allahn peruk hag toho Hindi wirik toho hiyag isaruk lahen.
Ap suwon Kaisar inowen uang heng neneptukmu og um teg ano, og um fug teg ano?" ulug kapal hibag.
Kapal haruk lit unundaman un ane wenggeltuk lit urukon ari Yesusen oluk atfareg,
" Uang anggen misig og Nirik maniyek, kim haminen, orohole ilit tehon men unuk haharehon men ap sa hahareg lit wereg?" ulug kapal isibagma, "Kaisar orohole men unuk men hahareg lit wereg," ibag.
Ari ibagma Yesusen hebeloho Ele uruk lit, "Kaisar og um hahon Kaisar og umuhup. Allah og Um hahon Allah og Umuhup," ibag.
Yesusen ari roho hiyag isarukmu hol hibareg unggum Ubam umbul pibahon ino umbuk fug teg latfagma enekolen enele eleg angge welatfag.
Misihim Saduki inap ap war atukon Allahn onolukap enebuhu fug peruk inap Yesus ambeg watfareg,

"Nonowe, Musan nit fahet haharoho imbibahon te: Ap misig umalik indag ta fug angge uhe tuhum weregma lin isalug war atukmu areyen nowe ubalmangge malik enderuhuk ulug hiyap ino hilahu ulug haharoho imbibag ane fahet niren kapal Huyul," ibag.
"Ap misig umalikisi enebe sabiren welatusa. Onowe wandabonen hiyap hilarisireg malik endebuk fug angge war atisi.
Hiyap oweyen lin tirisiyon ino ot pirenehon inowen hilarisireg at ino oho malik endebuk fug angge war atisi.
It piren itano war atusa hag toho hiyap misihon ino ekeyen wilil ekeyen wilil turukmen it fuwaben itano oho obog toho malik endebuk fug angge war eneg atuk latusama
hiyap ino oho war atisi.
Hiyap ino it sabiren itano og enesug latisi angge Allahn ap obog toho onolukap enebuhu sambil ap sabiren itano onolukap enebuhumu hiyap ino ap san oho laruhu?" ulug kapal hibag.
Kapal hibagma Yesusen, "Ap kinangmonen aben hiyap heleheg hiyaben ap heleheg turuk.
Allahn tu Numalikisi ulug ap onolukap enebuhumu poholma kuhupteg aben hiyap heleheg hiyaben ap heleheg tuhup fug.
It arimano Allahn onolukap enebuhumu war am fug angge Allah umalikisi malaikat hag toho welamuhup.

Musan haharoho imbibahon ariyen ap warehon onoluk amuhup ane seleg teg lit wereg. Musa e folim indok ambulpul turukmu iraham libareg Allah unuk uruk lit, 'Abraham Ikni re Allah wereg, Ishak men Yakub men Inikni re Allah wereg,' ulug Allah wel tibag.
Abraham men Ishak men Yakub men ap warehon hag toho wereg eleg. Allah olohotma werehon obog toho onoluk eneg wereg," ulug Yesusen hiyag isibag.
Hiyag isibagma Musa wene onoluk inap itanowen, "Nonowe, ehenon ari fano hiyag nesehen," ibareg
enele anggin atfareg eke umung ha fug angge welatfag.
Yesusen it arimano hiyag isaruk lit, "Aben Mesias ino fahet Daud amloho urukon ari nungge fahet uruk?

Daud inggarehen Mazmur wene fam hahatuk lit, 'Nikni Allah inowen an Nikni fam Ele uruk lit Hat men seli roho welahebon arimano Huyug apma umbuhuken Ninggik pikit fil tiya hur arik ma ibag,' ulug haharoho imbibag.
Daud inggarehen Kristus Nikni ibag angge famen Mesias ino fahet Daud amloho nangginoho uk teg?" ulug Yesusen kapal isibag.
Ap anggolo luhaleg latfahon holegma Yesusen otsi hiyag isaruk lit,

"Musa wene onoluk inap enele holuk fug angge welamok. Enesum yaron wan toho laruk lit pasar waruk ambeg lulmu ap anggolowen hi nenebusa ulug laruk lit wene uruk ibam kulug lehoma hur atuk lit seni esetuk ambeg lehoma hur atuk lit turuk inap enele holuk fug.
Suburu enebit naruk hag toho hiyap yuwohon enengge inibam feleng toho hilaruk lit aben fano helehesa ukag ulug sembahyang yaron uruk angge famen Allahn unusuruk lit mondabi siyagma umbusuhu," ibag.
Yesus o sembahyang uruk ibam kibareg yer enesugmen ap suwonen uang derma fahet ulug anggolo kilaptuk ambeg emberukmu yer isibag.
Yer isaruk lit hiyap yuwon eke anggengge elehon uang anggen piren emberukmu yet hibareg
Yesusen ele uruk lit, "Hiyap yuwohon aru anggengge eleg angge famen anggolo embehek, it winon enenggengge anggolo foroho angge famen tor angge embehesa.
It arimanowen enenggengge sebe roho werehon embehesama hiyap yuwohon ari suburu onggo paloho nahuk ulug fet taluhon itano obog toho embehek," ibag.

Ap welatfahon itanowen o Allah ibam walinggoho kim haruk lit, "Helep fanowon aruma fene aliliyangge fanowon lahabe feruson men mun angge man angge Allah fahet emberuk latuson men nenekolen-e," uruk latfagma Yesusen,
"Fano angge yet hehebon aruma tot welamuhukmu obog halog toho lin uruk lit helep palimu werehon aruma misig oho welaruhu fug, obog halog toho wambuhu," ibag.
Yesusen ari ibagma ap arimanowen kapal haruk lit, "Nonowe, Haren ehenon ari nosambil aruhu ane fahet ehen? Enehangge nungge hag toho tuhumu yet hahukteg nonoluk aruhu?" ulug kapal hibag.

Kapal hibahon fahet Yesusen hebeloho hiyag isaruk lit, "Hinindi ninap heneptuk inap waharuk lit An nunuk uruk lit ekeyen an Honowe tu waharuk lahi, ekeyen waruhu sambil horog teg ulug hunubam uk nowen honoluk toho wereg lit enele holuk fug.

Tog aptuk lit pin unusuruk urukmu holuhup ane Allah indimuwen tam perukon fam turuk ulug henekol toho welamuhup fug. Siyag ane ari turuk urukmu holuhup halug pohol kinang ketiya eleg atmisiyen turuk ulug puk fug," ulug hiyag isibag.
Hiyag isibareg nin Ele uruk lit, "O pumbuk ekeyen te o pumbuk eke min tog aptuk lamuhup. Ap ekeyen te ap eke min seli roho welamuhup.
O meken ap unusuruk lit suburu oboken eneyeg hambuk il, ouken ap war atil pohol keyen tuhu ane fahet enekol anggolo haruk lamuhup.

Anden ihiyon ari uwan tuk fugmu hit Yesus wene uruk inap ulug sen henebuhupteg hele wat heneplug wene uruk ibamen ap suwon wereg ambeg hondog henebuhupteg penjara fam kilap henebuhupmu pemerintah ap suwon men unggum kong turuk inap enelukema unduhuk hunubahik lahup.
Enelukema unduhuk hunubahik lahupmu hiren ap suwon hiyag isaruk lit nit Nonowe Yesus atisiyon ino hir oho Honowe aruhu ulug fag toho hiyag usul peruk lamuhup.
Hinog og hisahupmu nungge hebeloho uhuk ulug hinindi anggin toho welamuhup fug.
Hiren ino sambil uhup ane fahet Anden hiyag hisahukmu seliyonen hunusul puhubon arimanowen hunumbahakupteg enele eleg angge welamuhup.
Hiniknisi hinisingasi honowesi honotsi honori hunumbalisi arimanowen hunusukag ulug huruwe laruk lamuhupmu hit welahebon aruma winon eke pinggi hunusuhup.
Hit fahet ap aruma Yesus umalikisi wereg ulug ap obog tohowen ninirim uruk lamuhup.
Honoruk hununggulmu wilip atukon misig oho longgo uhup fug.
Wene fanowon hininggik ine roho senetuk lamuhupmu mondabi honoluk welamuhup."
"O Yerusalem pumbuk humon ino ap seliyon onolok inap arimanowen walinggoho kilap eneptukmu yer isahupteg ketiya pin unusuk ohoreg puhup.
O Yerusalem walinggoho wereg inap punu keyen longgo uhup, pumbukmu wereg inap folo-folo wilip amuhup, ho roho laruk ambeg werehon kik wamuhup fug.
Atam haharoho imbibahon hikit toho Allahn hebeloho unusuhu.
Siyag aruhu sambil ino hiyap malik forohowon men ag mondotukon men siyahap eneptuken inindi anggin toho welamuhup. Ap arimano siyahap eneptuk lit onolok ane unubam tuhup.
Karog ayeg fam kong toho ininggik hele waroho umu fil ahamu fil hondog eneplug lahup. Wene enepeleg inaben o Yerusalem unuyuhen sobir isahupmu Allahn uhu sambil eneg umbusuhup."
"Mo suhal pikalem ilalin toho inam aruhumu laut ik humon haglabut waharuk lit aplohok kelambag tirikim hondo nenebik oho reg ulug enekol anggolo hahup.
Pohol ine werehon yuk tuhumu kinangma tuma nungge inam atmisi ulug ap enekolen yuk lagmag uhupteg war amuhup.
Allahn tuhu sambil ino At ap kinangmon atfahon ino hina apmane Ebe ine roho umbagpag toho waharukmu yet hahup.
Alem tuhuwon ino ak tuhu sambil fanowap henebuhuwon ino horogma waharuk ulug in atug hinisanggo leho lit welamuhup."
Yesusen wene eke indit toho hiyag hisamin ibareg, "E ara men e winon anggen uruk ahen men yet homok.
E alit subalik oho lit pik wirig halug owil turukon li warik ohoreg ulug honoluk atuk.
Ari fam honoluk atuk hag toho Anden ihiyon aru turukmu yet hahupteg Allah ap obog toho Inikni aruhuwon ino ketiya horog teg ulug honoluk aruhu.
Ap ketiya werehon eleg am fug angge weregma Anden ihiyon aru teko lahu.
Pohol men kinang men eleg aruhu angge famen An nele uruk lahiyon ari eleg aruhu fug," ibag.

"Allah waruhu sambil ino aben pak wabuhuk ulug yebangge turukon hag toho yebangge elma kuhup tohon mun angge man angge kinangma werehon fahet wenggel ha fug angge suburu fahet henebuwap toho tuk fug angge ik olokon nalug nenek turuk inaben turuk hag toho tuk fug angge wereg lit hinindimu honoluk toho welamuhup.
Allah waruhu sambil ino ap obog toho kinangma werehon hondo enebik oho waruhu.
Siyahonen hondo heneptukmu fano wilip amuhuben At ap kinangmon atfahon ino Alukema hunumbahakuwen hinindimu honoluk teg lit sembahyang uruk lamuhup," ulug Yesusen hiyag isibag.
Unukoho Yesusen Allah wene uruk ibamen wene hiyag isaruk lit hubanggo Zaitun punumu nohik laruk latfag.
Ari turuk lit weregma ap anggolo Allah wene uruk ibam Aren wene hiyag nisarukon holtul ulug waharuk latfag.

Yahudi inaben suburu roti sig elehon naruk sul Paskah sul ino horog teg latfagma imam onowesi suwon men Musa wene onoluk inap menen ap anggolo weregma senebuk fug tehen nangginoho Yesus senebuhukteg wabuhuk ulug enele sahaltuk latfag.
Yesus otsi nisanggowen itano misig unuk te Yudas unuk eke Iskariot ino undama siyag angge Iblis kibareg
imam onowesi men Allah wene uruk ibam foroho inap men enembeg libag. Libareg Yesus hirahoma lahumu huruwe waruhuk ulug it arimano men enele sahaltuk lit hiyag isibag.
Hiyag isibagma enehiyeg hibareg niren uang onggo og humuhuk ulug hiyag itfag.
Hiyag itfagma Yesus hirahoma lahumu huruwe lahuk ulug indimu wenggel haruk lit welatfag.
Welatfagma roti sig elehon naruk sul wam domba Paskah esetuk sul ino horog atfagma
Yesusen Petrus men Yohanes men unubam hiyag isaruk lit, "Hit lalihipteg seni Paskah nit nulen eserik lalihip," ulug mon enepfag.
Mon enepfagma iren te, "Nonowe, seni Paskah ari o keman nulen eserik lalusa peruk lahen," ulug Yesus kapal hibagma Yesusen,
"O pumbukmu kilihipteg ap misihen ik kubag fam hinanggoho walug larukmu yet halihibon ari ombolim lalihipteg at kimisi ibam ino kilihip.
Kilihipteg o ngi ahun ino fam, 'Nonoweyen o keyen Notsi men seni Paskah nul ulug mon nenebehekma wahereg umung hiyaruk lahe,' ilihipmu
ap inowen o suwon mun angge man angge wereg ibam hiyag hisamisimu o ariyen isag neneplihip," ulug Otsi hiyag isibag.
Hiyag isibagma libareg Yesusen ibag ane hikit toho o ino hiyahibareg esetuk latfag.
Hup atfagma suburu nul ulug Yesus otsi men olma kibareg hur atfag.
Heriyeg lit weregma Yesusen, "An Honowe Nuwabuk fugmu hit min seni Paskah aru ambiyeg nul pihi.
Pihiyon ari naruk lahiyon aru hag toho fobik eke nahuk fug, Ninikni Allah wereg ambeg kuhukteg eneg mondabi fano welaruhuwon nahuk," ibag.
Ari ibareg kubag wibareg seneg lit sembahyang ibareg og isaruk lit, "Kubag tu walihipteg honori men fibir amek.
Anggur ahaluwe aru ketiya na fug angge welaruhukteg Allah ap obog toho Inikni aruhu sambil eneg ahaluwe nahuk," ibag.

Ari ibareg suburu roti wibareg sembahyang ibareg kut-kut otsi og isaruk lit, "Nebe aru hit fahet og hisahukon og hisaruk lahi. An fahet wenggel Niyaruk lit welamuhuben suburu ari roho naruk lamuhup," ibag.
Ibagma suburu roti nibagma ik kubag wibareg hinang isaruk lit, "Ik kubag aru wene keron werehen Allahn sali ibahon hikir amag ulug Namep hit fahet wilip aruhu," ibag.
"An fahet wabukag ulug huruwe lamin peruk lit werehon ino at inggiket An ninggiket suburu seneg lit naruk lahe.
At ap kinangmon atfahon Allahn perisiyon fam lahu. We At huruwe lahu ahun ino eneg indi anggin amag," ibag.
Ari ibag ane fahet it-it enele sahaltuk lit haren ano anden ano ulug it-it enele sahaltuk latfag.
Yesus otsi enele sahaltuk lit nit aruma welaheyon sehelimu misig sa suwon aruhu ulug umung-umung atuk latfag.
Umung-umung atuk latfagma Yesusen, "Ap suwon kinangma werehonen ininggareg palimuwap taruk lit onotsi apmayap eneptuk. Fano fer enesug lit welahe uruk angge famen enele mingming eneg eneptuk.
Hit An notsi welahebon aruma ap suwon ari hag toho welamuhup fug. Hit sehelimu an suwon welahi urukon ino malik toron amag, hiyag hisaruk lit mingming heneptuk ahun ino henemingmingangge amag.

Nori, sak esetuk ahun suwon peruk lahep? Ik hinanggik larukon suwon peruk lahep?" ulug Yesusen otsi umung isaruk lit, "Sak esetuk ahun ino suwon fug? An hit sehelimu welahiyon aru ik hinanggik larukon hag toho welahi," ibag.
"Nori, ap kinangmonen wal Niyarukmu hit eneg Numbahalug la fug angge welatikip.
Ninikniyen At ibam ngiyap Naptisi hag toho Anden hir oho ngiyap henebuhuk.
Allah ibamen suburu men ik men An men mangno roho naruk lit lehoma heriyeg lit Yakub umalikisi nisanggowen arimanowen ondohowonen tohon unggum kong isaruk lamuhup," ibag.
"Simon nare, Iblisen Allah fam heng turuk lit yasi ebe men uru men enetukon hag toho hit hinindi ninap henebuhuk ulug Allah fam heng tirisi.
Heng tirisi angge haren Allah fam wenggeltuk ane hindi nin aruhu rohon ulug Allah fam sembahyang ihi. Hat hindi hebeloho anggar atuk halug hori winon oho inindi wirikap eneptuk laruhun," ibag.
Ari ibagma Petrusen, "Nowe, Hat hele wat Habuhup halug an oho hele wat nabuhup. Hat war aruhun halug an oho ambiyeg war amuhuk," ibag.
Ibagma Yesusen, "Petrus, yoho hubanggo suwe ayam ele uk fugmu haren hinahanam hun ari an napeleg ulug awiya wamihinon ari tem toho ihi," ulug Petrus fam ibag.

"Anden mon heneptuk lit ilit uang kilaptukon, sum suburu yunggatukon, sepatu hunuyugmu kilaptukon men eleg angge mon heneptikik angge famen hit heneseher angge wereg latisi?" ibagma iren, "Nenesehet eleg latisi," ibag.

Ari ibagma Yesusen, "Ketiya re ilit uang kilaptuk angge suburu yunggatukon men hilalug laruk lamuhup. Mun angge man angge hininggikmu eleg halug henesum henebemon nonggoloho ap winon og isahupmu iren ayeg waroho og hisahubon fam karog olokon onggo paluhup," ibag.

Ari ibareg Yesusen, "Wene atam hahatfahon hikit toho An nubam turuk lamuhup. 'Ar oho siyag ane turuk inap enesehelimu weregma puhup,' ulug haharoho imbibahon ari hikit toho An nubam turuk lamuhup," ibag.
Ari ibagma Otsiyen Yesus fam, "Nonowe, karog piren tu wereg," ibagma Yesusen, "Ita wereg," ibag.
Ari ibareg Yesus otsi men wilip atfareg atam Zaitun punumu laruk latfag hag toho ino sambil oho Zaitun punumu libag.
Lul pibag ambeg ino libareg Otsi fam, "Siyahonen wal hisahu rohon sembahyang uruk lamek," ibag.
Ibareg tot yat toho libareg Elenggen fam hur atfareg kunuk teg lit sembahyang uruk lit,
"Allah Nikni, ik kubag famon ari namin fuhen hilak watmin pemihin halug hilak watnihinon ari Anden peruk lahi ane fug, Haren peruk lahen hag toho atmisi," ibag.
Ari ibagma malaikat monde fibahon inam atfareg ele ubam uruk lit ineyap tibag.
Yesus akol anggolo haruk lit Indi pong-pong angge turuk lit sembahyang urukmu lisag famen mep tep-tep wamburuk hag toho lisag tep-tep kinangma wamburuk latfag.
Sembahyang ibareg larukmen Otsi inindi anggin toho wereg lit nohorukmu libareg
Otsi fam, "Nungge fahet nohoruk lahep? Siyahonen hinindi ninap henebuhu rohon hinil wirik toho wereg lit sembahyang uruk lamek," ibag.
Yesus ele urukmen Otsi nisanggowen itano misig unuk Yudas inowen ap anggolo hondog eneplug at enelukema watfareg mako pug toho hi rimin ulug Yesus iraham libag.
Iraham libagma Yesusen te, "Yudas nare, At ap atik ibahon ino mako pug toho hi ruruk lit ap aruma hiyag isaruk lahen?" ibag.
Yesus otsi At men welatfahon arimanowen Yesus ki rurukmu yer isibareg, "Nonowe, ap ari roho turukon aruma karog fam unusul," ulug kapal hibag.
Kapal hibareg Ot misihen imam onowe suwon amingmingangge eke karog fam watuk lit isanggo pikit filon kong tibisibag.
Kong tibisibagma Yesusen imbisiyek ibareg isanggo ubalma yaho fisibag.

Yaho fisibareg imam onowesi suwon men Allah wene uruk ibam foroho inap men iniknisi suwon men unubam Ele uruk lit, "An ap enebe unusulug enenggengge hilaruk ahun hag toho welahimu karog men e paleg men senerehepteg wabul ulug wahep?
An hit sehelimu likiya hupmu Allah wene uruk ibam welatikik angge famen ki Naptikip fug. Hiren turuk lahebon ari hik tegma eneg tuk hag teg lahep," ibag.
Yesus senetfareg imam onowe suwon ibam hondoholug larukmu Petrus ombolim laruk latfag.
Imam ibam owahalma ap indok munggalfareg walinggoho heriyegma Petrus oho it sehelimu heriyeg latfag.
Hiyap ap suwon amingmingangge ekeyen Petrus indokma heriyegma yet hibareg fuki roho kim haruk lit, "Ap tu oho At men wereg latisiyon," ibag.
Ari ibagma Petrusen awiya waruk lit, "Hun ari an napeleg," ibag.
Tot weregman ap winonen pen hibareg, "Har oho it min welatikin," ibagma Petrusen, "An fug," ibag.
Ibareg nin tot welatfagma ap winonen ele haro roho uruk lit, "We tem toho hun tu Galilea ahun angge re At men ambiyeg welatisi," ibag.
Ari ibagma Petrusen, "An fug, haren uruk lahen ane ari an napeleg," ulug awiya warukmu suwe ayam ele ibag.

Ele ibagma Yesus hebeloho Petrus yet hibag. Yet hibagma Petrusen ayam ele yoho hubanggo uwan uk fugmu haren An nubahet hinahanam awiya wamihin ulug Nonowe inowen hiyag nerehekon ino tem toho ehek ulug indi anggar atfagma
wilip atfareg indimu siyag toho uba yatuk latfag.
Yesus senetfag inap arimanowen Ele ying turuk lit Orohole sale fibareg watuk lit, "Ap san Nuwatuk peruk lahen, hiyag nisimin," uruk latfag.
Enele anggolo uruk lit Inggaliyap turuk latfag.
Sakan tibagma o likiya Yahudi inap onowesi suwon men imam onowesi suwon men Musa wene onoluk inap men palu atfareg Yesus enelukema unduhuk fibag.

Unduhuk fibagma it ap suwon arimanowen enele uruk lit, "Hat Mesias fobik waruhu uruson Hat aru halug Hele hiyag nisimin," ibagma Yesusen, "Kapal Neyehebon ari fahet fag toho hiyag heselema tem toho pelep fug.
Anden hit kapal heselema hiren An hiyag Netep fug.
Ketiya famen At ap kinangmon atik ibahon ino Allah ineyon inggik pikit fil heriyeg lit welaruhu," ibag.
Ari ibagma iren te, "Ari ehen halug Allah amloho welahen?" ulug kapal hibagma Yesusen, "Hat Allah amloho welahen ehebon ari hiren ehep," ibagma
iren, "Inggareg ambilik fam fag toho ehekma nungge fahet ap winon kapal enebul," ulug uruk latfag.
It palu roho welatfahon arimano in atfareg Yesus hondoholug ap suwon Pilatus ambeg laruk latfag.

Libareg Pilatus ubam hiyag utuk lit, "Hun aruwen nonotsi inindi nonghonga feseruk lit Kaisar ino uang og um fug teg uruk lit Inggareg fahet Mesias ap suwon welahi ulug ari-ari urukmu niren holtukuk," ulug un-un ane Pilatus hiyag utuk latfag.
Pilatus hiyag utuk latfagma Pilatusen Yesus hinog og haruk lit, "Hat Yahudi inap onowe suwon welahen?" ibagma Yesusen, "We haren ehen ari," ibag.
Ari ibagma Pilatusen imam onowesi suwon men ap arimano men hiyag isaruk lit, "Anden umung hihimu siyag ane tirisiyon ehekon holihi fug," ibagma iren enele ine roho uruk lit,
"Hun aruwen uruk latisi ane re o Galilean ak tirisireg ap inindi kahal enebil laruk latisireg o Yudea tuma waharisi," uruk latfag.
Ari uruk latfagma Pilatusen hol hibareg hun aru Galilea ahun ano ulug kapal isibagma

Yesus Galilea ahun ulug hiyag itfahon oluk atfagma it Galilea inap Herodes apma wereg angge re Herodesen unggum ari kong timisiyen ambeg walug lalihip ulug hiyag isibag. Ari tibag sambil ino oho Herodes o Yerusalem weregma ambeg walug libag.

Herodes ambeg walug libagma Herodesen hun aru fahet anggolo urukmu holtuk latikik angge poholman turuk ane an nalukeman telepma yet hele, Ebe oho yet hele peruk latikik Ahun ino yoho walug wahasa ulug ahiyeg hibag.
Ahiyeg hibareg Yesus mun ane man ane roho kapal haruk latfagma Yesusen ele eleg angge welatfag.
Ele uk fug angge weregma imam onowesi men Musa wene onoluk inap onolohotma in atfareg un-un ane anggolo lombog turuk latfag.
Lombog turuk latfagma Herodes men otsi men arimanowen Yesus unuk lahap-pilap isaruk lit Inggaliyap tibareg sum ap suwonen wan turukon laha fisibareg suhuloho Pilatus ambeg walug lalihip ibag.
Herodes men Pilatus men ir oho seli roho welatfag angge famen ino sambil mangno atfag.
Imam onowesi men Yahudi inap onowesi men ap winonet palu enepfareg Pilatusen hiyag isaruk lit,
"Ap aruwen inindi kahal eneptuk ulug hiren an nambeg walug wahep. Anden ap aru hinog-og harukmu hinilen hehep. Siyag ane tirisiyon misig oho holihi fug angge famen hiren un ane Ubam lombohap tirikip.
Herodesen oho hinog-og hehekma siyag ane tirisiyon eleg ulug nin suhuloho aliyek ehekma alem anggin toho Ubam umbuk fug tehen ware fisiyek uk fug teg lahi.
E paleg fam eneg notsiyen wabusama lamisi," ibag.
O Paskah seni suwon esetuk sambil ari aren ap hele warehon misig-misig lol eseheg turuk latfag.
Ap welatfahon arimano enebe obog tohowen enele hum toho uruk lit, "Barabas eneg lol nisamihinteg ap aru il eleha fisin," ibag.
Hun Barabas inowen ap suwon enele nirim ulug tog aptuk lit ap eke ware fisibagma o penjara kilapfagma welatfag.
Ap arimano enele hum toho uruk lit Barabas lol nisimin uruk latfagma Pilatusen ele ine roho, "Yesus loloho wili fesemin," ibag.
Ibagma enele uruk latfahon arimanowen enele hum toho hun aru e fam telukag eneg uruk latfag.

Uruk latfagma Pilatusen inggik hinahaneg angge, "Hun aruwen siyag-siyag ane nungge tirisimu uruk lahep? Alem anggin toho Ubam umbuk fug tehen ware fisiyek uk fug tehen e paleg fam eneg notsiyen wabusama lamisi," ibag.
Ari ibagma it arimanowen enele hum toho at ele pilaptuk lit e fam telukag ulug heng turuk latfareg it enele palimu atfag.
Palimu atfagma Pilatusen iren pehesa ane tukag ulug inggik obog isibag.
Inggik obog isibareg Barabas tog aptuk lit ap eke ware fisibag ahun ino o penjaran inggik loloho wilip isibareg hit pehebon hag toho e fam teltihip ulug Yesus og isibag.
Yesus teltul ulug walug larukmen Simon Kirene ahun waharukmu salkal ibareg senetfareg teltuk ahen ino umaloma ha ribibareg Yesus ombolim lul ibag.
Ap anggolo mondoko ambiyeg laruk lit hiyap eke laruk lit uba yatil laruk latfag.
Uba yatil laruk latfagma Yesusen hebeloho kim isaruk lit, "Hit Yerusalem hiyap, An nubahet uba yabuk fug. Hininggareg fahet hunumalikisi fahet uba yag taruk lamek.
Tot welamuhukmu aben enele uruk lit, 'Hiyap malik indag ta fug angge ibili atukon men ag umaliken naruk elehon enehiyeg toho welamag,' uhup.
Tom fam enele uruk lit, 'Punu men tom menen kusoho hondo nenebiyek,' uhup.
Aben e olukon yaltukmu indoken folo-folo naruk eleg, aben e ilimon yaltukmu fululung toho naruk," ibag.
Yesus hondoholug laruk lit ap piren siyag-siyag ane turuk latfahon itano pinggi unusilihip ibahon itano men Yesus men ambiyeg hondog eneptuk latfag.
Hondog eneplug sili unuk "Ap unggul uwag silimu" libareg Yesus e fam tele fisibareg ap piren itano oho eke inggik pikit fil eke inggik hare fil tel enepfag.

Tel enepfagma Yesusen ele uruk lit, "Nikni, An ninggik e fam tel Nabehesa inap aruma it enepelehen inindi anggat teg elehen tehesama it fahet Hat hindi ahe laharukon eleg amag," ibag. Yesusen ari ibagma At asum san hilamisi ulug telfag inap arimanowen eneg atuk angge hik turuk latfag.

Ap anggolo unduhuk lit it turukon fahet kilap enesug latfag. Yahudi inap onowesi suwon arimanowen Yesus inggaliyap turuk lit, "An Allahn mumal Naptisiyon uruk lit ap winon fanowap eneptuk latisi angge tem toho Mesias ap obog toho fanowap enebuhuwon wereg halug Inggarehen oho fanowap tawag," uruk latfag.
Sehen seneg inap welatfahon arimanowen oho Inggaliyap turuk lit anggur ahaluwe sihon og Utuk lit,
"Hat Yahudi inap onowe halug Hinggareg hamuwen fanowap taruk tin," uruk latfag.
Unggul palimu hahatfahon ari, "Yahudi inap onowe suwon tu," ulug hahatfag.
Ap piren Yesus men tel enepfahon misihen Inggaliyap turuk lit, "Hat te Mesias ino fug? Hinggareg fanowap tamihinteg nir oho fanowap nenebin," ibag.
Ari ibagma areyen are komo ruruk lit, "Har oho e fam tel nenebehesa angge famen Allah fam hakol haruk lahen fug?
Nit nunuseheson ari turukuk ane fahet ayeg waroho e fam tel nenebehesa. Hun aru re siyag ane oho eke tirisi fug angge famen telehesa," ibag.
Ari ibareg Yesus fam te, "Hat ap suwon hag toho waruhun halug an fahet Hat hapeleg am fug," ibag.
Ari ibagma Yesusen, "Yoho hat min An min Allah wereg ambeg kinang fanoma welamul," ibag.
Welatfagma mo anum pulmu weregma hik atfareg mo il hililip teg latfareg mo haya ririkim sakan tibag.
Mo il hilihip tegma o Allah wene uruk ibam sum sokolma latuk asum ino pul ke pilang tibisik wambibag.
Yesusen ele hum toho uruk lit, "Nikni, An nahime fanowon Hat hinggikmu embemin," uruk lit sat eleg atfag.
Sehen seneg inap onowe inowen Yesus ari roho uruk lit war atukmu yet hibareg, "Ap aru we tem toho Indi pikiron war aha," uruk lit Allah wel til laruk latfag.
Allah wel til laruk latfagma ap anggolo unusurukmu yet usul ulug watfahon arimano Yesus war atukmu yet hibag ane fahet inindi anggin atfagma inindi wat til inibam libag.
Yesus men ambiyeg laruk latfahon arimano men hiyap o Galilean Yesus men ambiyeg laruk latfahon arimano men yatma unduhuk lit tibag ane ari yer isaruk latfag.

Ap misig unuk Yusuf ino ibam o Arimatea Yudea kinang fam werehon ino welatfag. Allah ap obog toho Inikni arik waruhu ulug oluk toho wereg lit ubabut fano roho indi pikit toho welatfag. Hun ino Yahudi onowesi palu rurukmu ar oho laruk latfagma it arimanowen Yesus wabukag ulug enele sahaltukmu Yusuf ino oho libareg Yesus wabuhup fug peruk lahi ulug hiyag isibag.
Hun Yusuf ino Pilatus ambeg libareg Yesus warehon hiyag nimin ulug heng tibag.
Heng tibagma Pilatusen fano wak lamihin ibagma Yesus wareg angge pilabe fibareg sum yanggowon fam hililip tibareg walug libareg owik ap warehon kilapfag fuhon ino kilabe fibag.
Kilapfag sambil ari sono wene uhuk ulug yoho hupmu olma welamul ulug Yesus owikmu kilapfag.
Hiyap o Galilean Yesus men ambiyeg laruk latfag hiyap arimanowen ebe wareg angge owikmu kilaptukmu yet hul ulug ambiyeg libareg owik ino pen hibareg inibam libag.
Libareg Yesus ebene are ribik lahukon ulug ahaluwe amben fanowon tug toho imbibag. O wene uruk sambil ino Musa wene onoluk inap turuk latfag ane hikit toho olma welatfag.
Hiyap itano wene ibahon ino likiyamon hubet-habet ahaluwe amben fanowon tug toho imbibahon wibareg owik Yesus imbibag ambeg ino libag.
Libareg yet harukmen helep sok latuk ahalep ino imbiloho ilanma weregma yet hibag.
Yet hibareg owik elman kim harukmen Yesus ebe wareg angge imbibag ambeg eleg latfag.
Eleg latfagma inindi su atfagma nanggintul ulug turukmen ap piren sum yanggowon umbagpag turukon wan tehon iniraham unduhuk latfag.
Unduhuk latfagma hiyap itano enekolen onorohole kunuk toho weregma ap piren itanowen hiyap itano fam, "At oluk wereg angge famen ap warehon emberuk ambeg nungge fahet yami rik wahep?
Allahn Olukap tehekma At tuma eleg. At Galilea wereg lit hiyag hisaruk lit,

'Ap kinangmon atfahon ino ap siyag ane turuk inap og isahupmu e fam teloho ware fesuhupmu inggik pirenam wareg welaruhureg hinahaneg angge Oluk aruhu,' ulug hiyag hisarisiyon ino hinindi honoluk toho welamek," ibag.
Ari ibagma Yesusen hiyag isibag ane fahet inindi anggar atfagma
owikmuwen suhuloho waharuk lit Yesus otsi nanggoloben men Ori winon men Yesus owikmu emberusa ambeg elegma hehe ulug hiyag isa libag.

Hiyap itano ununuk te Maria ibam Magdala hiyap ino men Yohana men Yakobus isinga Maria ino men owikmu libag hiyap itano welatfag. Nin hiyap winon eke it ambiyeg libahon arimano menen Yesus otsi hiyag isaruk latfag.
Hiyag isibagma Yesus otsi arimanowen, "Henele si ane uruk lahep ulug niren te tem toho peruk lahe fug," uruk latfag.

Ari uruk latfagma Petrus ino in atfareg folo-folo owikmu libareg kilap harukmen sum hililip tibag asum ino eneg weregma kilap hibag. Kilap hibareg suhuloho waharuk lit Ebe elegman sum eneg hihi ulug indi su atfagma wenggeltil waharuk latfag.
O ino sambil Yesus otsi piren o Emaus lul ulug laruk latfag. Emaus ari o Yerusalemen larukon tot yat toho (dua jam) wereg latfag.
It piren itano kema laruk lit Yesus ware fisibag ane fahet enele il-il laruk latfag.
Enele il larukmu Yesus it enembolma watfareg it men ambiyeg laruk latfag.
Ambiyeg laruk lit Allahn inil muma fisibagma Yesus fahet amuwon pibareg ambiyeg laruk latfag.
Laruk lit Yesusen, "Hit henele il laruk lahebon nungge fahet ehep?" ulug umung isibag. Umung isibagma it enehummu siyahen unduhuk latfag.
Unduhuk lit ap itano misig unuk te Kleopas inowen Yesus ubam, "O Yerusalemen ketiya turusa ane ari ap pohon werehon obog toho onoluk atisi angge famen we Hat misig eneg Hapeleg toho welahen?" ibag.

Ibagma Yesusen, "O Yerusalemen nanggintuson fahet ehep," ulug kapal isibagma iren, "Yesus Nazaret ahun ino nabi Allahn monde ferisiyon inowen Ele ine roho ap hiyag isaruk lit Allah men ap obog toho iniline fano ane turuk lit ap hihir eneptuk lit welatisi.

Niren te, 'Nit Israel ninap aruma fanowap nenebuhuwen Allahn At monde ferisi,' peruk latukuk. Peruk latukuk angge famen imam onowesi men ap suwon menen At senetusareg unggum angginon Ubam emberusareg e fam teloho ware feseruson fahet uruk lahe," ibag. "Ari turusa sali o yoho inggik hinahaneg angge welahe.
Welahereg hiyap nit minon itanowen hubet owikmu Yesus emberusa ambeg ha lahasareg,
'Yesus ebe warehon ino elegman malaikat yer eseheyon itanowen Yesus oluk aha ulug hiyag nesehesama wahe,' ulug nenekolap nenebehesa.
Hiyap itanowen tam ari ulug hiyag nisa wahasama nonori arimanowen owikmu lahasareg hiyaben ehesa ane roho weregma hehesa angge famen At Yesus oluk ahayon Ebe hehesa fug," ibag.

Yesus ubam ari ibagma Yesusen hebeloho hiyag isaruk lit, "Hit hinindi sohu roho welahebon nungge fahet henepeleg toho welahep? Allah wene hiyag isaruk latfag inap nabi arimanowen suwesingga haharoho imbibahon ari we tem toho imbibag angge famen nungge fahet wenggel haruk lahep fug.
Mesias ap suwon indag aruhuwon ino Allahn pibahon te ap kinangmonen tam wabuhupmu Anden fobik fanowap tuhuk pibag," ulug hiyag isil laruk latfag.
"Nin Musan haharoho imbibahon men Allah wene hiyag isaruk latfag inap arimanowen haharoho imbibahon men ari Mesias fahet haharoho imbibag," ulug seleg toho hiyag isil laruk latfag.
Hiyag isil laruk lit o lul pibag ibam horogma libareg Yesusen lamin ulug turuk latfag.
Turuk latfagma Yesus fam te, "A, o hup atuk lit mo ubuk ehekma lamihin fug, nit men ambiyeg nohul," ulug enele ine roho ibag. Ari ibagma it men nohul ulug olma kibag.
Olma kibareg suburu nul ulug heriyeg lit Yesusen suburu wibareg seneg lit sembahyang ibareg kuroho og isibag.
Suburu og isarukmu Allahn inil selehap tibagma tu Yesus ulug inindimu onoluk atfagma hirag atfag.
Yesus hirag atfagma iren, "Kema waharuk lit Allah wene indam haharoho imbibahon ino hiyag nisarukmu yihi ulug ninindi oko laha," ibag.
Ibareg in atfareg o Yerusalem suhuloho libareg Yesus otsi nanggoloben men onori winon men palu roho weregma libag.
Libagma it welatfahon arimanowen, "Nonowe Yesus Allahn Olukap tehekma Simon iline ebenam aha," uruk latfag.
Iren ari roho urukmu it piren itanowen oho, "Kema laruk lit ap amuwon pehe angge famen suburu kuroho og nisarukmu Nonowe Yesusen og nisaruk ulug nonoluk aha," ulug hiyag isaruk latfag.
It palu roho wereg lit enele sahaltukmu Yesus it sehelimu unduhuk lit unubam Ele uruk lit, "Notsi, hinindi se roho welamek," ibag.
Ari ibagma it yuk libareg Yesus amungguwat waha ulug enekol hibag.
Enekol haruk lit weregma Yesusen te, "Nungge fahet yuk lahep? Nungge fahet henekol toho wereg lit amungguwat waha ano ulug hinindi piren toho wenggel haruk lahep?" ibag.
"Ninggik nuwatusa ambeg oho Nuyug nuwatusa ambeg oho kim Neyemek, An Honowe wirik toho wahi. An yet Niyaruk lahep hag toho mungguwat unu men uwag men wereg eleg, pete Niya maniyek," ibag.
Ari ulug hiyag isaruk lit Ninggik Nuyug kim Neyemek ulug unug hibag.
Unug hibagma Nonowe waha ulug enehiyeg toho welatfag angge famen inindimuwen te Yesus fug ano peruk lit weregma Yesusen, "Suburu tot foroho lahep?" ibag.
Ari ibagma ikan wirahowon kong toho og Itfagma it iniline oko wibareg nibag.

Ikan nibareg Ele hiyag isaruk lit, "Tam hit min ambiyeg wereg lit hiyag hisaruk latikik ane Musa men wene hiyag isaruk latfag inap nabi men Mazmur menen wene An fahet haharoho imbibag ane hikir aruhu ulug Allahn peruk ane ulug hiyag hisarikik," ibag.
Yesusen ari roho hiyag isaruk lit inindi anggarap enepfagma wene atam haharoho imbibahon inindimu seleg atfag.
"Allahn Mesias indag aruhuwon ino ap kinangmonen wabuhupmu inggik hinahaneg angge olukap tuhuk ulug Allahn pibahon fam atam welatfag inaben haharoho imbibag.

Yerusalem aruman ak tuhupteg o pumbuk munon-manon hiyag isaruk lit Mesias unuk uruk lit hit hunubahet Allahn olok peruk latisiyon eleg atisimu hiren siyag-siyag ane turuk lahebon umbusuhup ulug hiyag isahup.
Indam hahatfag ane roho atisiyon hit hiniline teko larisi.
Nikniyen og hisahuk ulug sali palfahon ino Anden og hisahuk. O Yerusalem aru welamuhupmu Nikniyen hinineyap henebuhumu eneg o aruwen wilip amuhup," ibag.
Ari ibareg Yesusen otsi hondog eneplug o Yerusalemen wilip atfareg o Betania horogma libareg Inggik leg haruk lit hi enepfag.
Hi eneptuk li itano Allahn Yesus lisoho wibagma it embeselug poholma lahibag.
Poholma lahibagma Otsi kinangma hur atuk lit sembahyang ibareg enehiyeg hibareg o Yerusalem suhuloho libag.
Libareg Allah wene uruk ibam wereg lit likiya hupmu Allah wel turuk latfag.
Allahn pohol kinang uwan wal tuk fugmu wene aru tam welatfag. Wene aru Allah men ambiyeg welatfag. Wene aru oho Allah men ambi reg latfag.
Pohol kinang uwanma wene oho Allah men ambiyeg welatfag.
Allahn mun angge man angge wene famen eneg wal tibag. Mun angge man angge wene fam wal tibag fuhon te wereg eleg.
Wene aru famen mun angge man angge onolukap eneptukmu fano wereg. Onolukap eneptukon inowen ap fahet o seleg fanowon unubam emberuk.
Seleg ariyen hik teg ambeg umbagpag turukmu hik ariyen seleg atukon mapmu ruk fug teg.
Ap eke Allahn monde fibahon ino watfag, unuk te Yohanes.
Yohanesen seleg ino ilen hibareg hiyag isahukmu holuhupteg ap obog toho inindimu we tem toho puhup ulug watfag.
Yohanes ino o seleg hag toho watfag fug, aren o seleg hibahon ino hiyag isamin ulug watfag.
Seleg mondabi welaruhuwon ino kinangma waharuk lit ap obog toho unubam umbagpag tuhu.
At tam welatfag. At ino himbisig Allahn pohol kinang wal tibag angge famen kinangen At haruk latfag fug.
At ino Nangginang yugmu ulug watfag angge famen Oriyen te Angginang yuhon fam waha pibag fug.
Angginang yuhon fam waha pibahon arimanowen At unuk fam tem toho wenggel haruk latfagma Allah umalikisi amuhup ulug unduhuk fisibag.
It arimano indag atfahon ap enemep famen fug, ap enehaluwe famen fug, aben perukon fam fug, Allahn perukon fam eneg indag atfag.

Wene ino famen ap atfareg At nit nenesehelimu wereg. Allahn unuk suwap tirisimu niren yet harukuk. Namloho misig eneg ulug Ikniyen Unuk suwap tirisireg lehoma emberisireg At indi reg hag toho nir oho tik-tem toho Indi nenesug.
At fahet Yohanesen hiyag isaruk lit, "At ino tu fahet tam hiyag hisaruk latikik. An nombolim waruhu irikikon ino naluke fil wereg. An uwanma At ino tam welatfag," ulug hiyag isibag.
Aren nit obog toho Indi nenesug ane kobog toho umbusuk fug teg.
Allahn komo neneptuk ane Musa famen holtukuk, Ninikni Allah inowen Indi nenesug lit tem toho peruk ane Yesus Kristus famen nonoluk atisi.
Ap misihen oho Allah harisi fug. Amloho misig enehon ino Ikni alukema werehon inowen fag toho hiyag nisarisi.
Yahudi inap o Yerusalem welatfahon arimanowen imam inap men Lewi inap men Yohanes ambeg lalihipteg hat sa ulug kapal halihip ulug mon enepfagma libareg kapal hibagma Yohanesen fag toho hiyag isibag.
Aren awiya wa fug angge hiyag isaruk lit, "An te Mesias ap obog toho fanowap enebuhuwon ino fug," ibag.

Ari ibagma iren te, "At fug halug hat te sa? Hat Elia ano?" ulug kapal hibagma, "An Elia fug," ibag. Ari ibagma iren te, "Wene hiyag isaruk ahun nabi eke waruhu ulug hahatfahon ino har ano?" ulug kapal hibagma, "Ari an fug," ibag.
Yohanesen ari ibagma iren te, "Ari ehenma hat sa? Nit mon nenebehesa inap arimanowen kapal nisa nowen hat hinggareg fahet fag toho hiyag nisimin," ibag.

Iren ari ibagma aren te, "Yesayan haharoho emberuk lit ap eke anggenma werehon inowen ele hi roho uruk lit Ninikni suwon waruhu abunggalem pikit toho yaho feruk lamek ulug Yesayan haharoho imbibahon hiyag isarukon ino an aru welahi," ibag.
Ap mon enepfahon arimano Farisi inaben mon enepfahon welatfag.
It welatfahon arimanowen, "Hat Mesias men Elia men wene hiyag isaruk ahun waruhu ibahon ino waharikin fug halug te haren nungge fahet ap ikma pilap eneptuk lahen?" ulug kapal hibag.
Kapal hibagma aren te, "Anden ik fam eneg pilap eneptuk lahi. Ap misig aru hiren haruk lahep fuhon hit henesehelimu unduhuk lit wereg.
At ino Alukema an larukmu At ino an nombolim waruhu. An siyag nahun nubam sepatu lole Nubahin uhu fug," ibag.
Enele ibag ambeg ari Yohanesen ap ikma pilap eneptuk latfag ambeg ino o Betania ik Yordan fumag filen enele ibag.
Likiyamon te Yesus ino Yohanes ambeg waharukmu yet hibareg hiyag isaruk lit, "Ap kinangmonen siyag ane turukon elehap tuhuwen Allah ambohom domba tu waharuk.
Anden hiyag hisarikikon At ino tu fahet tam hiyag hisaruk lit, 'An Aluke fil weregma nombolim ap misig waruhuwon ino an uwanma At ino tam welatfahon waruhu,' ulug hiyag hisarikik.
An oho At napeleg anggeyen Israel inap At fahet onoluk aruhu ulug ik fam pilap enebik waharikik," ibag.
Ibareg Yohanesen hiyag isaruk lit, "Allah hime fanowon poholman suwe yalma hahon wambik waharisireg Ubam weregma yet harikik.

An oho At napeleg angge famen ik fam pilap eneptuk laruhun ulug Allah an mon naptisiyon inowen nubam Ele uruk lit, 'Hime fanowon wambik waruhureg ap misig Ubam weregma yet hahunteg At inowen Allah hime fanowon ap og isahuwon tu puhun,' ulug nubam irisi.
Allah amloho ino tu ulug nilen harikikteg fag toho hiyag hisarikik," ulug hiyag isibag.
Likiyamon Yohanes otsi piren men enele tam ibag ambeg itano unduhuk lit weregman
Yesusen it pisan isalug larukmu yet hibag. Yet hibareg Yohanesen otsi unubam ele hiyag isaruk lit, "Allah ambohom domba waharukon tu yet hemek," ibag.
Ibag ane ino otsi pirenen hol hibareg Yesus ombolim libag.
Ombolim larukmen Yesusen hebeloho yer isibareg Aren, "Nungge yami ril waharuk lahep?" ulug kapal isibagma iren te, "Nonowe, Hat welahen ambeg kema welahen?" ulug umung hibag.
Umung hibagma Aren te, "Kim halihiben maniyek," ibagma watfareg iren kim hibareg o ari sambil At men ambiyeg weregman hupmu atfag. Yesus men libag sul ari mo haya rurukmu laruk latfag.
Yohanesen ibag ane hol hibareg Yesus ombolim libahon itano misig unuk te Andreas, at ino Simon Petrus are welatfag.

Andreas ino are Simon men tam ambiyeg atfareg ubam hiyag utuk lit, "Mesias fobik waruhu uruk latfahon ino ninilen hehe," ulug hiyag itfag. Mesias ino Yunani inap enele roho Kristus nit fanowap nenebuhuwon fahet uruk.

Andreasen are Simon Yesus ambeg hondoholug libagma Yesusen at kim hibareg, "Hat te Simon, Yohanes amloho, hat hunuk Kefas suwal haptuk lahi," ibag. Kefas ari Yunani inap enele roho Petrus, nit nenele roho "helep ineyon" fahet uruk.
Likiyamon Yesusen o Galilea lul ulug turukmen Filipus men ambi atfareg, "An min ambiyeg lul," ibag.
Filipus ino ibam Betsaida ahun, Andreas men Petrus men inibam ambimu welatfag ahun watfag.

Filipus ino kema laruk lit Natanael men ambi atfareg ubam ele uruk lit, "Musa men ap wene tam hiyag isaruk latfag inap nabi menen ap misig fobik waruhu ulug tam haharoho imbibahon ino niren hehe, At ino Yesus Yusuf Nazaret ahun amloho ino," ibag.
Ari ibagma Natanaelen te, "O Nazaret inowen fanowon wilip am hag teg?" ulug ubam ibag.

Ari ibagma Filipusen te, "Nare ma, ambiyeg lulteg yet hamihin," ibagma hondoholug libagma Yesusen Natanael waharukmu yet hibareg, "Israel ahun ele si uk fug angge inggik apmane laruk elehon tu waharuken yet hemek," ibag.
Ari ibagma Natanael inowen te, "Nangginoho an fahet holuk teg?" il larikim Yesusen te, "Filipusen hat wol habuk fugmu Anden hat e ara alma weregma hiyarikik," ibag.
Ari ibagma Natanaelen at ubam ele uruk lit, "Nowe, Hat Allah amloho. Israel inap Onowe Hat welahen," ibag.

Ibag ane fahet Yesusen hebeloho hiyag utuk lit, "Anden hat e ara alma weregma hiyarikikon tu ihi ane fahet Allah amloho wereg ulug An fahet wenggel haruk lahen? Ari tot tohon hehen, fobik su ane tuhukon yet hahun," ibag.
Ari ibareg nin Yesusen, "Pohol fo regma Allah amingmingangge malaikat At ap kinangmon atik ibahon ino wereg ambeg lahuk wambuk turukmu yet hahun ulug ari tem toho hiyag hutuk lahi," ibag.
O hinahaneg sambil Galilea kinangon fam o Kana hiyap hilarukon fahet seni esetuk sul Yesus isinga oho welatfag.
Yesus otsi men oho seni ino ambiyeg nul ulug wol enepfag.
Wol enepfagma watfareg weregman anggur ahaluwe narukon eleg atfagma Yesus isingan amloho fam, " Anggur ahaluwe eleg ahama welahe," il larikim
Yesusen uruk lit, "Nisinga, Anden nungge ane hiyag hitmin," ibareg, "Anden tuk teg ane uwan lahi," ibag.
Yesusen ari ibagma Isingan seni esetuk latfag inap arimano unubam te, "Aren hiyag hisamisi ane roho eneg tilihip," ibag.

Seni esetfag ambeg horogma itano kubag falfaliken kinang fam lalfahon imbik watfag. Kubag arimano Yahudi inaben suburu nuk oho lit ininggik unuyug ik umatuk ane roho kubag humon imbik watfahon welatfag.
Weregman Yesusen ap seni esetuk latfag inap hiyag isaruk lit, "Kubag arima ik ololop tibil aliyek," ibagma ololop toho hinanggo feruk latfag.
Hinanggo fibagma Yesusen te, "Ik tot hinanggoho walihipteg seni ngi roho eserehek ahun ino og irik lalihip," ibagma hinanggoho walug libag.

Walug libagma hun seni ngi roho esetfag ahun inowen nek harukmen anggur ahaluwe unduk turuk latfagma nunggeyen teg aha ulug apeleg toho weregman we amingmingangge ik hinanggo feruk latfag inap arimanowen eneg onoluk teg latfag. Hun ino apeleg toho hiyap hilibag ahun ino wol tibareg
hiyag utuk lit, "Ap winonen oho ahaluwe fanowon tam hinang isarukmu naruk halug tot nenek turukmu siyahon hinang isaruk angge famen haren fanowon foroho lit welahen," ibag.

Ari tibag ane Yesusen enehangge eke uwan tuk fugmu enehangge tamon ari Galilea kinang fam o Kanaen tibag. Fobik fano ane tuhukon yet hahup ulug enehangge tibibag. Enehangge tibibag ane ino Yesus otsiyen yet hibareg Yesus fahet tem toho ulug inindi wenggel haruk latfag.
Ari tibareg Yesus isinga men Otsi men Ori men ambiyeg o Kapernaum libareg hup pirenam hinahanam welatfag.
Yahudi inaben suburu roti sig elehon naruk sul Paskah sambil ino horog atfagma Yesus o Yerusalem fil libag.
Libareg Allah ibam kurukmen wam sapi men domba men suwe yalma men onggo paloho waruk lit uang men ayeg watuk inap oho heriyeg lit ayeg watukmu kim isibag.

Ari turukmu kim isibareg hele fetnengge mase roho ki reg lit enembohomet enebeyet Allah ibam inowen yanggaloho wilip enepfag. E pila uang emberuk ambeg ino hebel isibareg uang arimano kinang ke hilil isibagma linggik-longgo ibag.
Suwe yalma ayeg waroho waruk latfag inap arimano unubam, "Hiren angge aruma obog toho o aruwen hilalug lalihip. An Nikni ibam hiren mun angge man angge ayeg waroho waruk ibamap tirikip," ibag.
Yesusen ari turukmu Otsiyen yet hibareg wene haharehon te, "Allah ibam aru Nindi haruk lit indok olok turuk hag toho Nundama nolok hihi," ulug haharoho imbibag ane fahet wenggel hibag.
Yahudi inap arimanowen Yesus pet turuk lit, "Niren Hat fahet ari roho tuk teg ahun wereg pulen nungge fam wal himin, yet hulen," ulug kapal hibag.
Kapal hibagma Yesusen, "O Allah ibam aru halog tibisiyek, we hinahanam ubalma wiri fesuhuken," ibag.

Ari ulug hiyag isibagma Yahudi inaben, "Allah ibam aru witikim mo ilig am wirig am turukmen teng-teng angge larikim (empat puluh enam tahun) witfag angge famen Haren we o hinahanam wiruhuk ehen?" ibag.
Yesusen Allah ibam fahet ibahon aru Inggareg ebe fahet wenggel haruk lit ibag.
Fobik Yesus war atfareg Oluk atfagma Otsiyen Yesus ibag ane aru wenggel hibareg tam haharoho imbibag ane men Yesusen irisi ane men tem toho irisi ulug Otsiyen peruk latfag.
Suburu roti sig elehon naruk sul hari Paskah Yesus o Yerusalem weregma ap anggolowen Aren fano ane turukmu yet hibareg Yesus aru tem toho ulug At unuk fahet fano peruk latfag.
Ap arimanowen wenggeltuk ane Oluk tehen Inggareg fahet fag toho hiyag isibag fug.
Aben unundaman peruk ane Yesusen oluk tehen, "Ap tu ubabut fano, ap tu ubabut siyag ulug ap winonen hiyap Numuhup fug," peruk latfag.
Farisi ahun misig unuk te Nikodemus Yahudi inap onowe roho welatfag.

At ino hubanggo Yesus ambeg watfareg ele uruk lit, "Nowe, Allahn te Haren wene hiyag isaruk laruhun ulug mon Haptisiyon ino nit nonoluk. Haren turuk lahen ane ari aben tuk fug tohon turuk lahen. Allah men ambiyeg werehonen eneg ari tuk hag teg," ibag.
Ari ibagma Yesusen Nikodemus fam Ele uruk lit, "Ap kinangmon keron eke indag atuk eleg halug Allah weregma pen ha fug teg ulug we tem toho hiyag hutuk lahi," ibag.
Yesusen ari ibagma Nikodemusen, "Ap sabal angge famen nin fobik hebeloho nangginoho indag am teg? Isinga ahummu kulug nin suhuloho indag am teg?" ulug kapal hibag.
Kapal hibagma Yesusen, "Ap kinangmon ikman men Allah hime fanowon ino fam menen indag atuk eleg halug Allah suwon weregma kuk fug teg ulug tem toho hiyag hutuk lahi.
Ap ahaluwe fam indag atukon ari ap ahaluwe aruhu. Allah hime fanowon famen indag atukon ari Allah hime fanowon ngi aruhu.
Hit nin fobik indag amuhup hubam ihiyon ari fahet hindi anggin am fug.
Siyelu fu ruruk halug aplohok holtuk lahen angge famen kema filen watlug kema fikit laruk, ari hat hapeleg. Siyelu ari hag toho ap Allah hime fanowon famen indag atukon ari hag toho wereg," ibag.
Yesusen ari ibagma hun Nikodemus inowen, "Nangginoho ari teko la reg?" ulug kapal hibagma
Yesusen te, "Hat te Israel inap hiyag isarukon onowe hat welahen angge famen ari fahet hapeleg toho welahen?
Nit nonolukon te fag toho uruk lahe, ninil fam harukukon hiyag hisaruk lahe angge famen holtuk lahep fug ulug tem toho hubam uruk lahi.
Kinangmon fahet hiyag hisaruk lahimu holtuk lahep fug angge re poholmon fahet hiyag hisarukmu nangginoho holehep ha reg?
Ap misig oho poholma lahibag fug, At ap atik ibahon pohol filen wambik watfahon ino eneg lahuk teg lit wereg," ibag.
"Israel inap farema wereg lit Musan pisanggo e fam lehoma imbibag hag toho At ap atik ibahon ino oho lehoma umbuhupmu
ap At ubam wenggel harukon arimano mondabi Allah wereg ambeg onoluk welamuhup.
Allahn ap kinangmon Indi isaruk lit Amloho we misig eneg angge famen og isibag. Amloho fam wenggel harukon longgo uk fug angge Allah men mondabi onoluk welamuhup.
Allahn amloho kinangma monde fibahon te unggum ap unubam umbuhu ulug monde fibag fug, fanowap enebuhu ulug monde fibag.

Ap sa At ubam wenggel haruk halug Allahn alem angginon at ubam umbuhu fug. Ap sa At ubam wenggel haruk eleg halug at ino Allah amloho misig enehon ino Unuk fam wenggel haruk elehen alem angginon apma wereg.
Alem angginon ino tu: Kinangma seleg ino waharisi angge famen ap kinangmonen siyag ane turuk latuson arimano iren te hik fahet eneg inindi reg lit wereg.
Ap san siyag ane turuk halug siyag angge ino hirako welamag peruk lit seleg teg ambeg laruk ane nirim peruk.
Ap san fano ane turuk halug Allahn let naptukmu turuk lahi ane ari inam amag peruk lit seleg teg ambeg waharuk," ulug hiyag isibag.
Yesusen wene ari hiyag isibareg Otsi men Yudea kinang keyen libareg Otsi men ambiyeg wereg lit ap ikma pilap eneptuk latfag.
Yohanes inowen oho o Ainon ino o Salim horogma ik anggolo werehen aren ap ikma pilap eneptuk latfagma ap anggolo pilap nenebukag ulug waharuk latfag.
Yohanes ino penjara uwan kilabuk fugmu ari turuk latfag.
Turuk latfagma Yohanes otsi men Yahudi ahun misig men ap ikma pilap eneptuk ane fahet suwahal uruk latfag.

Suwahal uruk latfareg Yohanes ambeg watfareg, "Nonowe, ap ik Yordan fumag fil hat men ambiyeg welatikibon ino At ino fahet haren hiyag nisarikinon inowen ap ikma pilap eneptukmu ap obog toho Ambeg waharuk," ulug hiyag itfag.
Hiyag itfagma Yohanesen te, "Ap ekeyen nungge-nungge inggareg indiyen hila fug teg, we poholmonen og utukon eneg hila reg," ibag.

"Anden At ino fahet harikik ane tam irikikon ari harikin ulug an nubam kapal neyehep. An Mesias ino fug. An At alukema laruk laruhun ulug monde nubaharisiyon inowen hiyag hisarikik ane ari hit honoluk.

Aben hiyap hilamin perukon ino hilaruk halug ap ino ngi atuk. Ap ino ot iraham werehon inowen hiyap hilihi urukmu hol halug noweyen fano helehek peruk. Ot inowen peruk hag toho anden oho fano peruk lit nahiyeg toho welahi.
At ino su aruhu, an tot aruhuk," ibag.
Pali filen waharukon mun angge man angge palimu wereg. Kinang filen waharukon kinangma angge men ambiyeg wereg lit kinangma ane uruk. Pohol filen waharukon inowen mun angge man angge palimu wereg lit
harisi ane men holtisi ane men hiyag isarukmu ap misihen oho we tem toho peruk eleg.
Ap misihen harisi ane hiyag isarukmu we tem toho perukon inowen Allah faher oho we tem peruk.
Allahn hime fanowon ap og isarukon winako og isaruk eleg. Winako og isaruk eleg angge re ap sa Allahn monde ferukmu at inowen Allah wene hiyag isaruk.
Ikniyen Amloho Indi reg lit mun ane man ane obog toho Inggikmu emberisi.
Ap san Amloho fam wenggel haruk halug at ino Allah men mondabi oluk welaruhu. Ap san Amloho ele holtuk elehon onoluk wereg ambeg yet hahu fug, at ino Allahn olok perukon ubam welaruhu.
Yohanesen ap tor angge ikma pilap eneptisi angge famen Yesusen ap anggolo Ambeg waharukmu ikma pilap eneptuk urukmu Farisi inaben hol hibag.
Yesus amuwen ap ikma pilap enepfag fug, Otsiyen eneg pilap eneptuk latfag.
Yesusen ap ikma pilap eneptuk ane Farisi inap hol hibag ane Yesus oluk atfagma o Yudea embeselug o Galilea suhuloho libag.
O Yudea embeselug Samaria keyen laruk latfag.
Libareg o pumbuk misig Samaria kinang fam werehon unuk Sikhar libag. Yusuf ikni Yakuben yabuk lin isibag ambeg o ino horogma welatfag.
Libag ambeg ino Yakuben ik fabulfahon welatfag. Yesus kema larukmen mo anum pulmu atfagma Yakuben ik fabulfag ambeg ino saren kel tamin ulug iraham hur atfag.

Hur atfareg weregman Yesus otsi suburu ayeg waroho wak lul ulug olma libagma Samaria hiyap eke ik hinang tamin ulug watfag. Watfareg ik hinanggibagma Yesusen hiyap ino fam, "Ik oboken hinang Nimin," ulug heng tibag.

Heng tibagma Samaria hiyap inowen, "Hat Yahudi hahunen an Samaria nuhe fam ik hinang Nimin ehenon nangginoho heng nabehen," ibag. Samaria inap men Yahudi inap men mangno roho welahe fug ulug ari ibag.

Ari ibagma Yesusen te, "Allahn ap fanowap eneptuk ane men hat hubam ik hinang Nimin ehekon ino men holuk teg lalenma haren ik At ubam heng telen. Heng telenma Aren ik eleruk ahik hinang hetlep," ibag.
Yesusen ari ibagma hiyap inowen te, "Nowe, ik hinangguruk angge Haren tohon elehen fo reg ambeg aru apma rehen ik eleruk ahik fanowon ari Haren nangginoho hinang num teg?" ibag.
"Nunumba Yakuben ik hinangguruk ambeg habul nisibareg at inggareg men umalikisi men ambohom men ik aru naruk latfag angge famen Haren te An suwon, at toron peruk lahen?" ibag.
Ibagma Yesusen hebeloho hiyap ino fam, "Ap san ik haren ehenon aru narukmu nin fobik ik obok haruk laruhu.

Ik Anden hinang isaruk lahiyon aru narukmu mondabi ik obok eleg aruhu. Ik Anden hinang isaruk lahiyon aru narukmu at ino undama ik eleruk ahik fanowon wilip aruhumu at ebe mondabi oluk welaruhu. Ik eleruk ari firig am fug angge mondabi wiliptuk laruhu," ibag.
Ibagma hiyap inowen te, "Nowe, an ik obok haruk laruhuk fuhen tuma hinang ta waharuk ane nirimen ik Haren ehenon ino hinang nimin," ibag.
Ari ibagma Yesusen, "Ik ino hinang nimin ehenma lamihinteg hahun hondoholug tuma watmihin," ibag.
Ibagma hiyap inowen, "An nahun eleg," ibagma Yesusen, "Nahun eleg ehenon tem toho ehen.
Ap fuwaben oho latikinteg ketiya oho lahenon ari hahun fug. Nahun eleg ehenon tem toho ehen," ibag.
Ari ibagma hiyap inowen, "Nowe, Hat tem toho Allahn mon Haptisiyon nabi welahenma ketiya an nindi anggar aha," ibag.
Ari ibareg hiyap inowen, "Nit niniknisi unumbusagsiyen tom aru famen sembahyang uruk latfag angge famen hiren te o Yerusalemen eneg sembahyang uk hag teg uruk lahep," il larikim
Yesusen, "Nehe, tot welamuhupmu punu tu famen eneg o Yerusalemen eneg Ninikni fam sembahyang uhup fug. Ihi ane ari tem toho ehek peruk lamin.

Hit Samaria hinaben sembahyang uruk lit hinilen ha fuhon ubam sembahyang uruk lahep. Nit Yahudi ninap halug nonolukon Ubam sembahyang uruk lahe. Allahn ap fanowap eneptuk ane ari Yahudi inap sehelimuwen ak teberisi.

Teko lahu ihiyon ino aruhu sambil ketiya horog toho welahe. Ninikni ubam sembahyang uruk inap inindi pikit tohon eneg Allah hime fanowon unubam werehonen eneg sembahyang uk teg. Ari roho uruk inap fahet eneg Allahn fano peruk.
Allah men Hime fanowon men Ebe misig hag toho wereg. Ap san Ubam sembahyang imin peruk halug indi pikit tohon eneg Allah hime fanowon ubam werehonen eneg sembahyang uk teg," ibag.
Yesusen ari ibagma hiyap inowen, "Mesias unuk eke Kristus ino waruhu urukon an noluk. At waruhureg mun ane man ane obog toho Aren hiyag nisahu," ibagma
Yesusen, "At ino An, An hat hubam Nele uruk lahiyon tu," ibag.

Enele urukmu itano Yesus otsi arimano watfareg inindimuwen amu hiyap aru men nungge fahet enele uruk peruk latfag. Peruk latfag angge famen Yesus otsi itano misihen oho "Nungge wenggel hehenteg hiyap aru men henele uruk lahep," ulug umung hibag fug.
Umung hibag fugmu hiyap ino kubag ik hinanggurukon ino embeselug ibam libareg ap welatfahon arimano unubam hiyag isaruk lit,
"Ap misihen anden tirikik ane fag toho ehek ahun ino yet halihiben maniyek. At ino Kristus ap obog toho fanowap enebuhuwon ano," ibagma
it arimano o pumbuk inowen wilip atfareg Yesus ambeg watfag.
It ari turukmu itano Yesus otsiyen, "Nonowe, Hat suburu amin," ibagma
Aren, "Anden suburu hiren haruk lahep fuhon foroho lahi," ibag.
Ari ibagma Otsiyen it-it umung-umung atuk lit, "Ap ekeyen nungge og Erehekma nenggek," ibag.
Ibagma Yesusen otsi unubam, "An mon Naptisi ahun inowen yabuk wituk laruhun ulug hiyag Nitisimu yabuk wiri fuhukon ari naruk angge hag toho wereg," ibag.
"Hiren te pikalem uhan lahumu suburu wirik aruhu uruk lahep fug? Ari uruk lahep angge famen Anden tot hiyag hisamin: Yabuk o walinggoho werehon yet hemek, suburu wirik atisimu ebe yahaluk teg.

Suburu yahaltuk ahun ubam ngi ahunen onggo og utuk. Suburu yahaloho palu ruruk ahun ino mondabi oluk welaruhu. Ei yatuk ahun men ebe yahaltuk ahun men enebe mangno roho wereg lit enehiyeg haruk lamuhup.
Ap enele indit toho uruk ane fahet tem toho uruk peruk lamek: Ap misihen ei yatukmu ap ekeyen ebe yahal taruk ulug indit toho uruk.
Anden te hiren ei yatikip fug angge famen ebe yahalik lalihip ulug mon heneptuk lahi. Ap winonen sat toho yag tarusa angge famen hiren ebe yahal taruk lahep," ulug Otsi hiyag isibag.

Samaria inap anggolo o inowen watfag inap arimanowen Yesus fahet tem peruk latfag. Hiyap tuwen anden tirikik ane Yesusen fag toho ehek ulug ibag ane fahet tem toho peruk lit Yesus fam wenggel haruk latfag.
Samaria inap arimano Yesus ambeg watfareg, "Hat nit men ambiyeg welamuhuk," ulug heng tibagma Yesus it men weregman hup pirenam atfag.
Yesus it men wereg lit wene hiyag isarukon holtuk latfareg ap anggolowen At ubam wenggel haruk latfag.

Wenggel haruk latfag inap arimanowen hiyap ino fam enele uruk lit, "Haren tam hiyag nisarikinon ino holtukukteg tem toho perukuk angge famen ketiya At inggarehen hiyag nisarukmu holehereg ap kinangmon obog toho fanowap enebuhuwon tu ulug tem toho wenggel haruk lahe," ibag.
Yesus hup pirenam o Sikhar welatfareg Galilea fil laruk latfag.
Yesusen otsi hiyag isaruk lit, "Ap misig ibam ngi reg ambeg ino Allahn monde ferukmu wene hiyag isarukon ele holtuk eleg," ibareg o Galilea lul ibag.

O Galilea kibagma Galilea inap arimanowen fano waha pibag. It arimano o Yerusalem suburu roti sig elehon narukon fahet libahon arimanowen Aren o Yerusalemen fano ane turukmu yet harukuk angge re At ino fano waha pibag.
Yesus o Kana tam ik anggur ahaluwe lalfag ambeg ino suhuloho watfag. Watfareg weregma o Kapernaum ap suwon ibam foroho latfag ahun ino amloho ouk waruk latfag.
Ouk waruk latfagma Yesus Yudea embeselug Galilea waha urukon hol hibareg Ambeg watfag. Watfareg, "Namloho ouk waruk lit war am hag teg lit werehen haren hihit nitmihin," ulug heng tibag.
Ari ulug heng tibagma Yesusen ubam Ele uruk lit, "Poholmonen turuk ane hinilen yet haruk lahep fug halug hinindi anggar aruhu fug," ibag.
Ari ibagma ap suwon ibam foroho latfag ahun inowen, "Nowe, namloho war am hag tehen lul," ibag.
Ibagma Yesusen, "Hamloho ari fano atmisiyen we hibam lamihin," ibag. Yesusen ibag ane fahet ap inowen indimu tem ehek ulug wenggel hibareg libag.
Ap ino kema larukmen amingmingangge salkal ibareg, "Malik ino fano aha," ulug hiyag itfag.

Hiyag itfagma ap inowen amingmingangge kapal isaruk lit, "Mo kiya weregma fano aha?" ulug kapal isibagma iren onowe fam hiyag utuk lit, "O sono mo anum pulmu weregma ubam inahan werehon eleg atisi," ulug hiyag itfag.
Hiyag itfagma ikni ino indimuwen ita liyim Yesusen malik fano atmisi irisiyon fam fano atisi pibag. Ari pibareg at men uhe malik menen Yesus fam wenggel haruk latfag.
O Yudea embeselug o Galilea libareg Yesusen poholmonen turuk ane aru inggik pirenehon tibag.
Welatfareg Yahudi inaben Allah wel tul ulug o Yerusalem palu arik laruk latfag sambil ino Yesus oho o Yerusalem libag.

Yerusalem elehet oko kilabehon fam sok humon unuk te "Domba" welatfag. Sok ino iraham ik sene misig yenggeleg latfag. Ik ari Ibrani inap enele roho Betesda suwaleg latfag. Ik ino ayegma o fuwaben ungga eneg saloho wirigmu
ap ouk warukon anggolo men inil siyahon men unuyug siyahon men inine elehon anggolo men o itano fam yinggig lit wereg latfag. It arimanowen ik il lebe rimisi ano ulug kilaboho lit welatfag.

Hup misihim-misihim malaikat Allahn monde ferukmu ik ino il kilil-kalal isaruk latfagma ap atam hik toho wambibag ahun ino fano atuk latfag. Ouk ekeyon-ekeyon ubam wereg angge famen fano atug laruk latfag.
O ino fam ap misig ouk waruk lit yinggigmen mo ilig am wirig am turukmen teng misig nubam hilag nanggoloben (tiga puluh delapan) atfagma welatfag.
Ap aru indam angge ouk waruk lit wereg ulug Yesus undaman tam Oluk atfareg ap ino fam, "Nare, hat hundaman fano ale peruk lahen?" ulug kapal hibag.

Kapal hibagma ap inowen Yesus fam ele uruk lit, "Nowe, ik il ket lebe ririkim itano wambele angge famen ap let naptukon elehen ik horogma lalug wambimin peruk angge famen it winon tam wamburukon fano atug laruk," ibag.
Ibagma Yesusen ap ino fam, "In amin, halit heniye hilalug lamihin," ibag.
Yesusen ari ibagma ap ino fano atfareg heniye hilibareg libag. Yesusen ari tibag sambil aru Yahudi inap wene uruk sul hari Sabat ino tibag.
Wene uruk sambil welatfagma Yahudi inaben ap fano atfahon ino fam, "Wene uruk sambil halit heniye wehenon haren tuk fug ane tehen," ibag.
Ibagma ap inowen, "An hihit nabehek ahun inowen heniye hilamihinteg lamihin ehekma laruk lahi," ibag.
Ari ibagma iren ap ino kapal haruk lit, "Ap san halit heniyeyet hilalug lamihin ulug hiyag herehek?" ulug umung hibag.
Umung hibagma fano atfag ahun inowen ebe hiyag isamin ulug turukmen Yesus ap anggolo arimano sehelimuwen longgo ibagma Unuk napeleg ulug imbisibag.
Tot welatfareg wene uruk ibam Yesus men ap ino men ambi atfareg itano Yesusen, "Hat hihit habihiyon ariyen fano ahenma fobik mondabi siyahon hubam aruhu rohon siyag ane eke tuhun fug," ibag.
Yesusen ari ibagma ap ino wilip atfareg Yahudi inap unubam, "An hihit nabehek ahun ino Yesus inowen hihit nabehek," ulug hiyag isibag.
Ari hiyag isibagma Yahudi inap arimanowen o wene uruk sambil tuk fug ane tehekma wabuhuk ulug mutug laruk latfag.
Ari turuk latfag angge famen Yesusen hiyag isaruk lit, "Nikniyen yabuk indam angge turukmen ketiya oho turuk. Ari fahet Anden oho turuk lahi," ibag.

Ari ibagma Yahudi inaben hol hibareg inindi inahan anggolo hibareg pinggi wabuhuk ulug wenggeltuk latfag. Atam oho wene uruk sambil saliyohap tehekteg fobik oho Allah An Nikni uruk lit Allah men ambi reg lahi ulug wirim tehekma wabuhuk pibag.

Yesusen hiyag isaruk lit, "Amloho amu yabuk wibuk fug tehen Ikniyen witukmu yet halug Amlohowen oho wibuk hag teg ulug tem toho hiyag hisaruk lahi. Ikniyen turukon ari hag toho Amlohowen oho tuk teg lit wereg.
Ikniyen Amloho Indi reg lit mun ane man ane Inggarehen wituk ane Amloho hiyag Utuk lit yabuk suwon eke sebe roho hiyag Uruhumu hiren henekolen yihi uruk lamuhup.
Ikniyen ap warehon unduhuk felug onolukap eneptuk hag toho Amlohowen oho Inggareg indimuwen timin puhuwon arimano onolukap enebuhu.
Ikniyen unggum angginon Amu kong tuk fug anggeyen unggum obog toho Namlohowen kong tukag ulug hiyag Itisi.
Ap obog toho Ikni wel turuk hag toho Amloho wel turuk lamuhup. Ap san Amloho wel turuk eleg halug at inowen Ikni monde ferisiyon ino oho wel tuhu fug," ibag.

"Ap san An nawene holtuk lit An mon Naptisiyon Ubam indi wenggel haruk halug at ino war atuk ambeg embeselug mondabi onoluk wereg ambeg weregma unggum angginon ubam aruhu fug ulug ari tem toho hiyag hisaruk lahi.
Ap war atuson arimanowen Allah amloho Ele holuhup. Holuhubon arimano onoluk welamuhup. Ihi ane ari fobik teko lahuwon ketiya oho teko laruk, ari we tem toho hiyag hisaruk lahi.
Ikniyen ap onolukap eneptuk hag toho Amlohowen oho ap onolukap enebukag ulug Ikniyen Amloho ineyap tibag.
Amloho ap kinangmon atik ibahon ino wambik watfagma unggum kong tukag ulug Ikniyen ineyap tibag.

Ap war atusama sal eneptuson arimanowen At ele holuhupmu fano ane turuk latfahon arimano in enebuhumu mondabi onoluk welamuhup, siyag ane turuk latfahon arimano in enebuhureg unggum angginon unubam umbuhu. Ari tuhu ane teko laruk halug hiren yihi uk fug."

"An ninggareg nindiyen nungge-nungge tuk fug teg lahi. An Nikniyen hiyag Nutukmu holtuk lahiyon hikit toho unggum kong turuk lahi. An namu nindiyen unggum kong turuk lahi fug, Nikni mon Naptisiyon inowen hiyag Nutukon hikit toho eneg kong turuk lahimu wirim toho teko laruk.
An namuwen turuk lahiyon ari fahet fano ulug Ninggarehen wel ta fug teg lahi.
